44008035	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Felipe ayuuk yajtzondaaky kapxtu̶u̶wu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios ñaky mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ etíope ja'ay najty kyapxypyu̶ñ , chi du'un yajmu̶dmu̶dyaaky je̱'e̱ oybyu̶ ayuuk tu̶y'ajt neby je̱'e̱ Jesús jyajty y'abejtyu̶ñ .
44008036	Kujeky oy jya'tku̶xy ma tu'ug wok ma najty nu̶u̶ju̶ñ , chi je̱'e̱ etíope ja'ay mu̶jtuungmu̶u̶dpu̶ myu̶naañ : — Chaa nu̶u̶ ; ¿ nej ka'p u̶u̶ch mu̶baad nu̶u̶bétyu̶ ?
44008037	[ Chi je̱'e̱ Felipe ñu̶maayu̶ : — Pu̶nu̶ mu̶bu̶jkypy je̱'e̱ Jesús miich tu'ug'aa tu'ugjoot , mu̶baad mnu̶u̶béty . Y chi je̱'e̱ etíope ja'ay mu̶jtuungmu̶u̶dpu̶ y'adzooy : — Nmu̶bu̶jkypyu̶ch ko je̱'e̱ Jesucristo Dios Ung je̱' . ]
44008038	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ kyarreeta yaj'yo'oybyu̶ nu̶maay ko je̱'e̱ carreetu̶ wan yajwa'kxú̶py , y chi nime̱tzk ñú̶kxku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ nu̶u̶ju̶ñ , y chi je̱'e̱ Felipe yajnu̶u̶bejty je̱'e̱ etíope ja'ay mu̶jtuungmu̶u̶dpu̶ .
44008039	Ko ñu̶u̶bu̶dzu̶u̶mgu̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ etíope ja'ay mu̶jtuungmu̶u̶dpu̶ je̱'e̱ Felipe du'uñyu̶ ijxtu̶gooyñu̶ , je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'Espíritu je̱'e̱ yajnú̶kxu̶ , y chi je̱'e̱ etíope ja'ay mu̶jtuungmu̶u̶dpu̶ tyu'uyo'oy'adu̶u̶ch janch jootkujk .
44008040	Felipe yajpaady jim ma je̱'e̱ Azoto kajptu̶ñ , chi ñajxy kajpt kajpt kapxwa'kxy je̱'e̱ oybyu̶ ayuuk tu̶y'ajt , u̶xtu̶ jya'ty jim Cesarea kajpt .
44009001	Je̱'e̱ Saulo ka'p najty je̱'e̱ ja'ay u̶xmach mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt mu̶bu̶jkku̶xpu̶ñ , janch mu̶k najty y'awa'anda'agy , tyimyyaj'o'kta'awaangu̶xypy najty . Paady je̱'e̱ teedy windzú̶n nigu'ubajk'ajtpu̶ oy ixy ,
44009002	y yujkwaañ naky tu'ug ta'tzpú̶ky ko jim Damasco ñu̶kxa'añ ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ñaymyujktaakt ajku̶xyu̶ñ , u̶xta'awa'añ pu̶njaty je̱'e̱ jembyu̶ Dios ñu̶u̶ tyu'u panú̶kxku̶xpu̶ñ , y yajmina'añ najty mach ajku̶xy jim Jerusalén wan ya'aydyu̶jktu̶jk y to'oxyu̶jktu̶jku̶ch ajku̶xy .
44009003	Peru̶ ko je̱'e̱ Damasco kajpt najty timymyu̶wingoonu̶ , chi amoñygyu̶joot tyu̶kxu̶'ky tu'ug je̱'e̱ ju̶u̶n mu̶dyiibu̶ tzajpjooty tzombu̶ñ y ñigu̶daaku̶ ju'uwu̶dítyu̶ .
44009004	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Saulo kyu̶daay , y mu̶dooy je̱'e̱ ayuuk tu'ug ko ñu̶ma'ayii : “ Saulo , Saulo , ¿ ti u̶u̶ch ko xy'u̶xwu̶dity xypyawu̶dity ? ”
44009005	Chi je̱'e̱ Saulo yajtu̶u̶y : “ ¿ Pu̶n miich , Windzú̶n ? ” Chi mu̶dooy ko y'adzoowu̶ : “ U̶u̶ch je̱' je̱'e̱ Jesús , je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ miich m'u̶xwu̶dijtypy mpawu̶dijtypyu̶ñ . ” [ Ku̶'u̶m du'un mnaychaachtyuñyii du'un neby je̱'e̱ wajyuubu̶ ko je̱'e̱ kyu̶'u̶mbawojpt ju̶jpkune̱bu̶'u̶y mu̶dyiibu̶ mu̶u̶d y'u̶xkumy pyagumyiiju̶ñ . Chi je̱'e̱ Saulo chu̶yuuygyóty mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ tzu̶gu̶'u̶ñ , y myu̶naañ : “ Windzú̶n , ¿ ti mdzojkypy ndúnu̶chu̶ch ? ” Chi je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús ñu̶maayu̶ : ]
44009006	Pu̶du̶'u̶g y nu̶kx kajptjooty , y jim myaj'awaanu̶yu̶ch tii mu̶baad mduñu̶ñ .
44009007	Je̱'e̱ ja'ay mu̶dyiibu̶ najty tzooñu̶ñ ajku̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Saulo , mu̶k je̱'e̱ jyanchtzu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ ayuuk mu̶doogu̶xy y ko ka'p pu̶n maa ijxku̶xy .
44009008	Chi je̱'e̱ Saulo pyu̶du̶'ky y ko y'ijxwa'kxy ka'p najty y'ok'ijxnu̶ . Chi ku̶'u̶gú̶xy majtzku̶x , y wijtznú̶kxku̶xy jim Damasco .
44009009	Tu̶gu̶u̶g xu̶u̶ jim wiindz y'ijty , y jaygyay jay'u'ugy .
44009010	Jim Damasco najty ja'ay tu'ug chu̶na'ay mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Jesús y'ayuuk mu̶bu̶jku̶byu̶ñ , Ananías je̱'e̱ najty xyu̶u̶'áty , je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios kuma'ayjyooty yaj'ijxu̶ y ñu̶maayu̶ : “ ¡ Ananías ! ” Chi je̱' y'adzooy : “ Chaa u̶u̶ch Windzú̶n Dios . ”
44009011	Chi je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios ñu̶maayu̶ : “ Pu̶du̶'u̶g y nu̶kx ma je̱'e̱ tu'u mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ ‘ Tu̶ydyu'u ’ , y jim ma je̱'e̱ Judas tyu̶jku̶ñ yajtú̶w tu'ug je̱'e̱ Tarso ja'ay , mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Saulo . Dios mu̶bu̶jktzoob je̱'e̱ jim cham ,
44009012	y kuma'ayjyooty je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios tu̶ yaj'ixyii ko je̱'e̱ ja'ay tu'ug mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Ananías , ñimiñyii y kyu̶'u̶ni'ixajyii neby mu̶baad ja'adu'ook y'ijxu̶'u̶gyu̶ñ . ”
44009013	Ko adaa du'un mu̶dooy , chi je̱'e̱ Ananías y'adzooy : “ Windzú̶n Dios , may u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ ja'ay du'un tu̶ xyajmu̶dmu̶dya'agy neby je̱'e̱ Saulo jim Jerusalén ju̶bu̶k y'adu̶'u̶chu̶ñ u̶xwu̶dity pawu̶dity je̱'e̱ mja'ay ajku̶xy .
44009014	Y jada'a ya tu̶ myiñ mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ naky , ma je̱'e̱ teedy windzu̶ndu̶jk ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ tu̶ myo'oyiiyu̶ñ ko je̱'e̱ ja'ay majtzta'awu̶ch , yajnu̶kxta'awu̶ch mach ku̶xyu̶ pu̶njaty je̱'e̱ mxu̶u̶ miich xy'o'owu̶dajtu̶byu̶ñ . ”
44009015	Peru̶ je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios je̱'e̱ Ananías nu̶maayu̶ : “ Nu̶kx , u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ jimbu̶ ja'ay tu̶ nwin'ixy , neby u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ n'ayuuk ndu̶y'ajt mu̶baad xykyapxwa'kxu̶ju̶ñ ma je̱'e̱ naax kajpt ku̶xyu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ ka'p jyudío ja'ayu̶chu̶ñ , y ma je̱'e̱ ane̱'e̱mbu̶du̶jk , y nan ma je̱'e̱ Israel ja'ay ajku̶xyu̶ñ .
44009016	U̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ nyajni'ixu̶'u̶wu̶py neby je̱'e̱ ayo'on mu̶j mu̶nax yajnáxu̶chu̶ñ mu̶u̶d u̶u̶ch kyu̶xpu̶ . ”
44009017	Chi je̱'e̱ Ananías ñu̶kxy ma je̱'e̱ Saulo najty tu̶ jya'tta'agyu̶ñ . Ko tu̶gooty tyu̶gu̶u̶y , chi je̱'e̱ Saulo ku̶'u̶ni'ixajy , y nu̶maay : — Mu̶gu'ug Saulo , je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús mu̶dyiibu̶ nayyajni'igu̶xu̶'ku̶ jim tu'ugujk ma najty mmiñu̶ñ , je̱' u̶u̶ch tu̶ xykyexy neby mu̶baad ja'adu'ook m'ijxu̶'u̶gyu̶ñ y neby je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo mu̶baad xy'adu̶gu̶'u̶y xyjyoottu̶gu̶'u̶yu̶ñ .
44009018	Mu̶k'eemby kya'ay ma je̱'e̱ Saulo wyiinu̶ñ du'un neby je̱'e̱ akx ni'imeeñu̶ñ , chi mu̶'ityu̶ y'ijxu̶'ky . Mu̶'it pyu̶du̶'ky y chi yajnu̶u̶be̱jtu̶ .
44009019	Mu̶'itnu̶ kyaay y'uuky y chi je̱'e̱ myu̶k myu̶jaa paaty , y chi jim tu'kxu̶u̶ me̱jtzxu̶u̶ wyu̶'u̶my mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim Damasco tzu̶naaygyu̶xpu̶ñ .
44009020	Chi je̱'e̱ Saulo mu̶k'eemby kapxwa'kxtu̶gu̶u̶y je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ñaymyujktaakt ajku̶xyu̶ñ jim Damasco , chi myu̶na'añ ko je̱'e̱ Jesús , Dios Ung je̱' .
44009021	Ku̶xyu̶ pu̶njaty najty je̱'e̱ Saulo y'ayuuk mu̶doogu̶xpu̶ñ , mu̶k najty je̱'e̱ yajnú̶kx yajju̶wu̶u̶ygyu̶xy , y ñayñu̶maayu̶gu̶xy : — ¿ Nej ka'p adaa jye̱'e̱ju̶ch je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ ja'ay najty u̶xwu̶dijtp pawu̶dijtpu̶ñ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Jesús xyu̶u̶ mu̶yaaxp o'owu̶dajtku̶xpu̶ñ jim Jerusalén ? ¿ Nej ka'p adaa jye̱'e̱ju̶ch je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ ya nandu'un tu̶ myiñ ja'ay myajtzpu̶ y nu̶kxy ku̶'u̶ye̱ga'añ ma je̱'e̱ teedy windzu̶ndu̶jk ajku̶xyu̶ñ ?
44009022	Peru̶ je̱'e̱ Saulo aamú̶k jootmú̶k najty je̱'e̱ Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt kapxwa'kxu̶yu̶ , y je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim Damasco tzu̶naaygyu̶xpu̶ñ , ku̶jx jyoot wyinma'añ je̱'e̱ tyu̶gooydyaaygyu̶xy ko du'un mu̶doogu̶xy nigapxta'ay ko je̱'e̱ Jesús je̱' je̱'e̱ Cristo .
44009023	Tu̶ najty jeky y'ijtnu̶ , ko je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ñaygyápxu̶gu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Saulo yaj'o'ogaangu̶xy ,
44009024	peru̶ je̱' ñejwu̶u̶y je̱'e̱ du'un . Jim najty xu̶u̶m tzum tyu'udu̶na'ayii ajku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ poch aguuy kajppa'abu̶ju̶ñ , yaj'o'oga'añyii ajku̶xy ,
44009025	peru̶ chi je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk mu̶jkachjyooty pyu̶daaku̶gu̶xy y kyu'udu̶u̶yñajxu̶gu̶xy mu̶jkoodz ma je̱'e̱ pochkyu'uduuy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ kajpt najty mu̶u̶d jyu'ubojtz'awu̶dítyu̶chu̶ñ . Y du'un kyeeky .
44009026	Ko je̱'e̱ Saulo jim Jerusalén jya'ty , chi je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk ja'apuyo'oyu̶'u̶waañ . Y chi nigu̶xyu̶ najty mu̶k chu̶gu̶u̶yu̶gu̶xy , je̱' ko ka'p najty je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkku̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Saulo je̱'e̱ Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt najty nandu'un tu̶ mu̶bu̶jknu̶ .
44009027	Chi je̱'e̱ Bernabé je̱'e̱ Saulo mu̶dnu̶kxy , kapxku̶xu̶'ky ma je̱'e̱ apóstolestu̶jk ajku̶xyu̶ñ . Chi ku̶xyu̶ yajmu̶dmu̶dyaaktaay ajku̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Saulo je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús najty tu̶ ixy jim tu'ugujk , y ko je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús najty tu̶ myu̶gapxyii , y nan ko je̱'e̱ Saulo Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt najty tu̶ kapxwa'kxu̶ aamú̶k jootmú̶k jim Damasco .
44009028	Y du'un je̱'e̱ Saulo jim Jerusalén wyu̶'u̶my , y je̱'e̱ apóstolestu̶jk najty myu̶dwu̶dijtnu̶p , kapxwa'kxy je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt aamú̶k jootmú̶k ,
44009029	mu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xy y ñaymyu̶kmu̶gápxu̶gu̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ griego ayuuk kápxku̶xpu̶ñ . Peru̶ je̱' ajku̶xy ñiwinmayu̶u̶ygyu̶xypy je̱'e̱ najty ko je̱'e̱ Saulo yaj'o'ogaangu̶xy .
44009030	Ko je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk oy du'un nejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ Saulo jim Cesarea yajnú̶kxku̶xy , y ko jim Cesarea yajja'tku̶xy chi jim Tarso ke̱jxku̶xy ko wan jim nu̶kxy .
44009031	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiijáty je̱'e̱ Jesús mu̶bu̶jkku̶xpu̶ñ jim Judea naaxjooty , jim Galilea naaxjooty , y jim Samaria naaxjooty , jootkujk najty je̱'e̱ chu̶naaygyu̶xnu̶ y ni'igyu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt u̶xpu̶jk'adu̶u̶tzku̶xy . Yajmu̶j'ajtku̶xypy je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús najty , y mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo pyube̱jtu̶ñ , ni'igyu̶ najty ñimayu̶y'adu̶u̶tzku̶xy .
44009032	Ko je̱'e̱ Pedro najty wyu̶dity , ku'ixy mu̶gapxy je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk kajpt kajpt , ooy nandu'un ma je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim Lida tzu̶naaygyu̶xpu̶ñ .
44009033	Jim je̱'e̱ ja'ay tu'ug mu̶dnaybyaattu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Eneas , mu̶dyiibu̶ najty tu̶ pya'am'ijtnu̶ tuktujk jumu̶jt , ku̶'u̶xúxy tekyxyuxy je̱'e̱ najty .
44009034	Chi je̱'e̱ Pedro je̱'e̱ Eneas nu̶maay : — Eneas , Jesucristo cham xyajtzookp . Pu̶du̶'u̶g y yajpu̶du̶'u̶g yu̶'u̶ mmabe̱jt . Chi je̱'e̱ Eneas mu̶k'eemby pyu̶du̶'ky .
44009035	Y ku̶xyu̶ je̱'e̱ ja'ay du'un ijxku̶xy tú̶kxku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim Lida y jim Sarón tzu̶naaygyu̶xpu̶ñ , y chi nigu̶xyu̶ jyootwimbijttaaygyu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ Diosu̶ñ , u̶xmajtztaaygyu̶xy je̱'e̱ ñi'ap winma'añ , y panú̶kxku̶xnu̶ je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús y'u̶xpu̶jku̶ñ .
44009036	Je̱'e̱ mu̶'it tiempo jim Jope najty to'oxyu̶jk tu'ug chu̶na'ay mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Jesús mu̶bu̶jkpu̶ñ , Tabita je̱'e̱ najty xyu̶u̶'áty , je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ griego ja'ay tyijpyu̶ñ ajku̶xy Dorcas . Je̱'e̱ Dorcas oyjya'ay'ajtu̶ñ najty je̱'e̱ tyuundu̶u̶by y pubety je̱'e̱ ayoobu̶du̶jk ajku̶xy .
44009037	Du'un jyajty , chi je̱'e̱ Dorcas pya'ambejty y chi tyimy'o'ky . Y ko yajtziidaay ajku̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ o'kpu̶ yajnú̶kxku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ ni'ibe̱ttu̶jku̶ñ .
44009038	Je̱'e̱ Jope kajpt wingón najty je̱' mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Lida kajpt , ma je̱'e̱ Pedro najty yajpaadyu̶ñ , y ko je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk oy nejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ko najty jim yajpaady , chi je̱'e̱ ja'ay me̱tzk ke̱jxku̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Pedro wan nu̶kxy nu̶maaygyu̶xy : “ Jam tzojku̶ jim Jope . ”
44009039	Y chi je̱'e̱ Pedro ñu̶kxy mu̶u̶d je̱' ajku̶xy . Ko jim jya'ty , chi myu̶dnu̶kxu̶ ma je̱'e̱ ni'ibe̱ttu̶jk ma je̱'e̱ o'kpu̶ najty yajpaadyu̶ñ , y jim je̱'e̱ ku'o'ogytyo'oxyu̶jktu̶jk je̱'e̱ Pedro ju'ubigu̶u̶ygyu̶xy , jyanchyaaxku̶xy cham je̱'e̱ wit y je̱'e̱ ni'ijé̱n yaj'ijxku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dorcas najty tu̶ yajkojyu̶ñ ko najty jyugy'atyñu̶ .
44009040	Chi je̱'e̱ Pedro ja'ay ke̱jxpu̶dzu̶u̶mdaay , y chi ñayñajtzkojxtu̶na'awu̶u̶yu̶ y mu̶bu̶jktzooy je̱'e̱ Dios ; chi je̱'e̱ o'kpu̶ windu̶kxpejty , nu̶maay : — ¡ Tabita , pu̶du̶'u̶g ! Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Tabita wyindu̶kxu̶'ky , y ko je̱'e̱ Pedro ijxy , chi y'u̶ñaaygyugu̶u̶y .
44009041	Chi ku̶'u̶gú̶xy majch y wijtzu̶'ky ; chi je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk y je̱'e̱ ku'o'ogytyo'oxyu̶jktu̶jk mu̶j'yaaxy , y juugy yajku̶'u̶du̶gu̶u̶yñu̶ ajku̶xy .
44009042	Adaa , ku̶xyu̶ je̱'e̱ ja'ay du'un nejwu̶ydyaaygyu̶xy jim ma je̱'e̱ Jope kajpt ko je̱'e̱ Pedro je̱'e̱ Dorcas yajjuugypyu̶jky , y may je̱'e̱ ja'ay je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús mu̶bu̶jkku̶xy .
44009043	Jeky je̱'e̱ Pedro jim Jope wyu̶'u̶my ma je̱'e̱ po'o'ák oydyuumbu̶ tyu̶jk , mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Simón .
44010001	Jim Cesarea kajpt najty ja'ay tu'ug tuungmu̶u̶dpu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Cornelio , capitan'ajtp najty je̱' ma je̱'e̱ tziptuumbu̶ batallón mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ el Italiano .
44010002	Je̱'e̱ Cornelio tu'uda'agyjya'ay je̱'e̱ najty , y je̱' mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ y'ung tyo'oxyu̶jk ku̶xyu̶ yajmu̶j'ajtku̶xypy je̱'e̱ Dios najty . Nan pyubejtypy najty je̱'e̱ judío ayoobu̶du̶jk ajku̶xy meeñ'aam , y nan Dios o'owu̶dajtu̶u̶b najty jaboom jaboom .
44010003	Chi tu'ook , jii da'a kudu̶gu̶'u̶xu̶u̶ ko je̱'e̱ Cornelio Dios yaj'ijxu̶ : Ijxy janch'oy janchwa'adz tu'ug je̱'e̱ Dios y'ángel ñidu̶gu̶'u̶yii ma je̱' najtyu̶ñ y ñu̶ma'ayii : “ ¡ Cornelio ! ”
44010004	Chi je̱'e̱ Cornelio je̱'e̱ ángel windu̶kxpejty y janch tzu̶gu̶u̶by najty mu̶k , chi yajtu̶u̶y : “ ¿ Ti mdzojkypy Windzú̶n ? ” Chi je̱'e̱ ángel ñu̶maayu̶ : “ Du'un neby mDios'o'owu̶dátyu̶ñ y du'un neby je̱'e̱ ayoobu̶du̶jk mbubetyu̶ñ , tu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios du'un ku'umáy .
44010005	Ke̱x je̱'e̱ mja'ay nije̱' jim ma je̱'e̱ Jope kajptu̶ñ , wan je̱'e̱ Simón nu̶kxy yajtzóngu̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ nandu'un yajtijpu̶ñ Pedro .
44010006	Jim jya'ttaakt je̱'e̱ mu̶u̶du̶ch ma je̱'e̱ ja'adu'ukpu̶ Simongu̶ñ , je̱'e̱ po'o'ák oydyuumbu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ tyu̶jk mejypya'aju̶ñ ”
44010007	Ko je̱'e̱ ángel ñu̶kxnu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ najty tu̶ myu̶gapxyii , chi je̱'e̱ Cornelio tyuumbu̶ me̱tzk mu̶j'yaaxy y tu'ug tziptuumbu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios oy kapxymyu̶doobu̶ñ y mu̶dyiibu̶ oy mu̶duunu̶bu̶ñ ,
44010008	y ko ku̶xyu̶ yajmu̶dmu̶dyaaktaay ajku̶xy neby je̱'e̱ ángel ñu̶maayu̶ju̶ñ , chi jim Jope ke̱jxku̶xy .
44010009	Y kujaboom jii najty da'a kujkyxu̶u̶da , jim najty je̱'e̱ kexyo'oybyu̶ jya'adaangu̶xnu̶ mu̶wingón je̱'e̱ Jope kajpt , chi je̱'e̱ Pedro pyejty tu̶jkku'uduuy Dios o'owu̶dajtpu̶ .
44010010	Mu̶k najty yu'o'ogyii y ja'akayaamb najty , peru̶ jimnu̶ je̱'e̱ jyu̶kxy pyu̶ky najty y'oyu̶'u̶y , chi je̱'e̱ Dios yaj'ijxu̶ :
44010011	ijxy ko je̱'e̱ tzajp y'awa'ach y ko kyu̶da'agy naaxkú̶xy du'un neby je̱'e̱ poob wit mu̶jpu̶ju̶ñ , xyóchu̶ch mu̶dax'it majaty je̱'e̱ tyaatzku̶ñ .
44010012	Jiiby ma je̱'e̱ poob witu̶ñ jiiby najty no'on ju̶yujk ka'anaagnáx mu̶dyiijáty je̱'e̱ kyu̶'u̶ tyeky mu̶daaxku̶ñ , y jiiby najty tza'añdy nandu'un y joon muuxy .
44010013	Y chi je̱'e̱ ayuuk tu'ug mu̶dooy ñu̶ma'ayii : “ Pedro , pu̶du̶'u̶g ; yaj'o'og yu̶'u̶ no'on ju̶yujk y tzu'udz ju̶kx miich yu̶'u̶ . ”
44010014	Chi je̱'e̱ Pedro y'adzooy : “ Ka'p , Windzú̶n , nimu̶naaxu̶u̶ u̶u̶ch yu̶'u̶ du'umbu̶ no'on ju̶yujk nga'atzu'uchñu̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ ju̶bu̶ku̶ñ y mu̶dyiibu̶ ka'p ñigu'udúkyu̶chu̶ñ nu̶kxy je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay tzu'tzku̶xy . ”
44010015	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ ayuuk ja'adu'ook mu̶dooy ñu̶ma'ayii : “ Mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios tu̶ yajwa'achu̶ñ , ka'p miich je̱'e̱ mu̶baad mdijy ko jyu̶bú̶ku̶ch . ”
44010016	Tu̶gu̶u̶g'ook je̱'e̱ du'un tyuunu̶ jyajtu̶ , chi je̱'e̱ poob wit tzajpjooty pya'ttu̶gu̶u̶yñu̶ .
44010017	Jim je̱'e̱ Pedro najty tyajy myay jyanchwinmay neby je̱'e̱ du'un wyimbu̶dzu̶myu̶ñ je̱'e̱ tu̶u̶bu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios najty yaj'ixyii , ko oy jya'tku̶xy tu̶jk aguuy je̱'e̱ Cornelio kyexyo'oybyu̶du̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Simón tyu̶jk najty mu̶du̶u̶gu̶xp yajtu̶u̶gu̶xpu̶ñ .
44010018	Ko jya'tku̶xy chi mu̶k kyugapxu̶u̶ygyu̶xy yajtu̶u̶gu̶xy pu̶nu̶ jii je̱'e̱ Simón najty jya'tta'agy mu̶dyiibu̶ nandu'un yajtijpu̶ñ Pedro .
44010019	Y je̱'e̱ Pedro je̱' najty je̱'e̱ wyinmaaybyñu̶ je̱'e̱ tu̶u̶bu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios najty yaj'ixyii , chi je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo ñu̶maayu̶ : “ Chi je̱'e̱ ja'ay nidu̶gu̶u̶g xy'u̶xtaaygyu̶xy .
44010020	Pu̶du̶'u̶g , mu̶nak y nu̶kx mu̶u̶d yu̶'u̶ ajku̶xy y ka'p tii mwinmay , je̱' ko u̶u̶ch yu̶'u̶ tu̶ ngue̱jxku̶xy ko xy'u̶xtaaygyu̶xu̶ch . ”
44010021	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Pedro myu̶najky ma je̱'e̱ Cornelio kyexyo'oybyu̶ ajku̶xyu̶ñ , y nu̶maay ajku̶xy : — U̶u̶ch je̱' je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ miich m'u̶xtaaygyu̶xypyu̶ñ ; ¿ ti tu̶ mnimiingu̶xy ?
44010022	Chi je̱'e̱ y'adzoogu̶xy : — Je̱'e̱ Cornelio u̶u̶ch tu̶ xykye̱jxku̶xy , je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ capitan'ajtpu̶ñ , je̱'e̱ tu'uda'agyjya'ay mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios yajmu̶j'ajtpu̶ñ y mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ku̶xyu̶ chojkku̶xypy y kyu'umaaygyu̶xypyu̶ñ . Je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'ángel tu'ug nu̶maayu̶ ko miñ miich myajwóy , y mnú̶kxu̶ch ma je̱' tyu̶jku̶ñ y amdo'ida'añ neby miich myaj'u̶xpú̶kyu̶ñ .
44010023	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Pedro je̱'e̱ kexyo'oybyu̶du̶jk yajtu̶jktu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy , y chi jim yajwu̶'u̶mu̶u̶ygyu̶xy . Kujaboomnu̶ je̱'e̱ Pedro ñu̶kxy mu̶u̶d je̱' ajku̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk nije̱' pyanu̶kxu̶ ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim Jope tzu̶naaygyu̶xpu̶ñ .
44010024	Y kujaboom jim Cesarea jya'tku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ Cornelio najty jya'ay'éxyu̶ñ ni'amugu̶'u̶ mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ y'ajuugy y'amu̶gu'ug y pu̶n mu̶u̶d oy ñaymyu̶gu'ug'adyiiju̶ñ , mu̶dyiijáty najty tu̶ woyu̶ñ .
44010025	Ko je̱'e̱ Pedro jya'ty ma je̱'e̱ tu̶jku̶ñ , chi je̱'e̱ Cornelio tyu̶jkpu̶dzu̶u̶my oy je̱'e̱ Pedro ju̶jpkubadu̶'u̶y , y chi ñayñajtzkojxtu̶na'awu̶u̶yu̶ ma je̱'e̱ wyinduuyu̶ñ , yajmu̶j'ada'añ najty .
44010026	Chi je̱'e̱ Pedro je̱'e̱ Cornelio wijtzu̶'ky , nu̶maay : — Tu̶naayu̶'u̶g , ka'p u̶u̶ch xyajmu̶j'áty , nan ja'ayu̶ch u̶u̶ch nandu'un du'un neby miichu̶ñ .
44010027	Cham mu̶dkapxy mu̶dmu̶dya'agy y cham tyu̶jktu̶gu̶'u̶y ko je̱'e̱ mayjya'ay paaty ni'amugu̶'u̶ jya'ay'e̱jxu̶gu̶xyu̶ .
44010028	Chi je̱'e̱ Pedro ñu̶maayu̶ ajku̶xy : — Miich ajku̶xy mnejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xypy ko ka'p je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay kyostumbre du'un myiñ , nu̶kxy yo'oymyujk ñajxmujkku̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶chu̶ñ ajku̶xy , y nan ka'p mu̶baad tyu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ jyu̶u̶n tyu̶jk ajku̶xyu̶ñ . Peru̶ u̶u̶ch tu̶ u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ Dios xyajni'ixu̶'u̶y ko u̶u̶ch ka'p mu̶baad ni pu̶n ndijy ju̶bu̶kja'ay o axu̶u̶gja'ay .
44010029	Y ko u̶u̶ch oy tu̶ xyajwoyii , paady u̶u̶ch tu̶ nmiñ , y ka'p u̶u̶ch nej tu̶ nmu̶na'añ . Y jada'achám je̱' u̶u̶ch nja'anejwu̶'u̶we̱e̱mby tii u̶u̶ch ko oy tu̶ xyajwoyii .
44010030	Chi je̱'e̱ Cornelio y'adzooy : — Cham myu̶mu̶daaxxu̶u̶ju̶'u̶y , du'un neby adachambu̶ hooru̶ju̶ñ , yaa u̶u̶ch najty ayuu n'ity ma u̶u̶ch ada ndu̶jku̶ñ y nDiosmu̶bu̶jktzóyu̶ch ku'udu̶gu̶'u̶xu̶u̶ , mu̶naa je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay Dyiosmu̶bu̶jktzoogu̶xyu̶ñ , ko je̱'e̱ ja'ay tu'ug ñayyajni'igu̶xu̶'ku̶ janch adu̶kxp ajajp je̱'e̱ wyit .
44010031	Chi u̶u̶ch xyñu̶maay : ‘ Cornelio , tu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios mmu̶bu̶jktzoowu̶ñ xymyu̶doowu̶ , y tu̶ du'un ku'umáy neby je̱'e̱ ayoobu̶du̶jk mbubetyu̶ñ .
44010032	Ke̱x je̱'e̱ mduumbu̶ jim Jope wan je̱'e̱ Simón nu̶kxy yajtzooñ mu̶dyiibu̶ nandu'un yajtijpu̶ñ Pedro . Jim je̱'e̱ jya'tta'agy ma je̱'e̱ ja'adu'ukpu̶ Simón tyu̶jku̶ñ , je̱'e̱ po'o'ák oydyuumbu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ mejypya'a tzu̶naaybyu̶ñ . ’
44010033	Paady mu̶k'eemby nnigue̱xu̶u̶y ko wan nu̶kxy xy'u̶xtaaygyu̶xy , y tu̶ je̱'e̱ may'ajt mduñ ko tu̶ mmiñ . Y jada'achám chaa u̶u̶ch nigu̶xyu̶ ajku̶xy Dios winduuy , y n'amdo'idaangu̶xyu̶ch je̱'e̱ m'ayuuk ku̶xyu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios tu̶ xyajnu̶ma'ayu̶ñ xy'awaanu̶chu̶ch ajku̶xy .
44010034	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Pedro kyapxtu̶gu̶u̶y , y myu̶naañ : — Jada'achám nwinju̶wu̶u̶ybyu̶ch ko je̱'e̱ Dios ka'p je̱'e̱ ja'ay win'ixy tzoky , y'agu̶tzojktaaby je̱'e̱ ku̶xyu̶ wanpú̶nu̶ch ,
44010035	kyu'ubu̶jktaaby je̱' wan pu̶nja'ayu̶ch mu̶dyiibu̶ wiing naax wiing kajpt tzu̶naaygyu̶xpu̶ñ , pu̶nu̶ windzu̶gu̶u̶yu̶gu̶xp naty y pu̶nu̶ tyuungu̶xypy je̱'e̱ oybyu̶ naty .
44010036	Dios tu̶ je̱'e̱ tyu̶y'ajt kexy ma je̱'e̱ Israel ja'ay ajku̶xyu̶ñ , yajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xy ko jii je̱'e̱ jootkujk'ajtu̶ñ cham mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Jesucristo u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ nWindzú̶n nigu̶xyu̶ ajtu̶m ajku̶xy .
44010037	Miich mnejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xypy oy yajxón tii tu̶ tyuñ tu̶ jyadyii ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ñaax kyajpt ku̶xyu̶ ajku̶xyu̶ñ , chondaaky jim Galilea , ko najty je̱'e̱ Juan Bautista Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt jayu̶jp tu̶ kapxwa'kxu̶ y jya'ayyajnu̶u̶bejty .
44010038	Y mnejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xypy miich ko je̱'e̱ Dios mu̶k'ajtu̶ñ y je̱'e̱ y'Espíritu Santo mooy je̱'e̱ Jesús Nazaretpu̶ , y neby je̱'e̱ Jesús wyu̶dijtyu̶ñ tuuñ je̱'e̱ oy'ajtu̶ñ . Du'un neby je̱'e̱ ja'ay ku̶xyu̶ yajtzookyu̶ñ mu̶dyiijáty je̱'e̱ mu̶jku'u najty ane̱'e̱mu̶bu̶ñ ajku̶xy , y du'un tuuñ je̱' ko je̱'e̱ Dios najty mu̶u̶d y'ity .
44010039	U̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ ku̶xyu̶ nnidu̶y'ajt'ajtypy ajku̶xy tijaty je̱'e̱ Jesús tyuunu̶ñ jim Judea naaxjooty y jim Jerusalén . Mu̶'it cruutzkú̶xp yaj'o'kku̶xy .
44010040	Peru̶ kudu̶gu̶u̶g xu̶u̶ je̱'e̱ Dios yajjuugypyu̶jky , y chi yajni'igu̶xu̶'ky ma u̶u̶ch ajku̶xyu̶ñ .
44010041	Ka'p yajni'igu̶xu̶'ky ma je̱'e̱ ja'ay kú̶xyu̶ju̶ñ , je'eyu̶du̶'ajty yajni'igu̶xu̶'ky ma u̶u̶ch ajku̶xyu̶ñ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios jayu̶jp wyin'ijxu̶ñ neby u̶u̶ch mu̶baad nnidu̶y'ajt'átyu̶ñ ajku̶xy . U̶u̶ch kaay uuku̶ch ajku̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱' ko najty tu̶ jyuugypyú̶ky .
44010042	Y je̱' u̶u̶ch tu̶ xykye̱jxku̶xy ayuuk kapxwa'kxpu̶ ma je̱'e̱ ja'ay ajku̶xyu̶ñ , ko je̱'e̱ Dios je̱'e̱ Jesús tu̶ pu̶da'agy mu̶jtu̶ydyuumbu̶ ma je̱'e̱ juugypyu̶jku̶ñ y ma je̱'e̱ o'ogypyu̶ju̶ñ .
44010043	Nigu̶xyu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuknajtzkapxu̶u̶ybyu̶du̶jk je̱'e̱ Jesús najty jékyu̶p tu̶ nimu̶dyaakku̶xy , y du'un najty tu̶ myu̶naangu̶xy ko ku̶xyu̶ pu̶njaty je̱'e̱ Cristo mu̶bu̶jkku̶xpu̶ñ , Dios je̱'e̱ pyoky kyu̶dyeey winmé̱kxu̶xu̶p ajku̶xy .
44010044	Cham najty je̱'e̱ Pedro kyapxyñu̶ , ko je̱'e̱ Dios y'Espíritu Santo nigu̶xyu̶ y'adu̶gu̶u̶y jyoottu̶gu̶u̶yu̶ ajku̶xy mu̶dyiijáty najty je̱'e̱ ayuuk amdo'ijtku̶xpu̶ñ .
44010045	Y je̱'e̱ judío mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk ajku̶xy je̱'e̱ tu̶u̶bu̶ najty kipxy myiingu̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Pedro , mu̶k je̱'e̱ tyajy myaay y yajnú̶kx yajju̶wu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo nandu'un kejxy ma je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶chu̶ñ ajku̶xy ,
44010046	ko mu̶doogu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ wiingpu̶ ayuuk kápxku̶xy y ku'umaaygyu̶xy ja'aymye̱jtzku̶xy je̱'e̱ Dios .
44010047	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Pedro myu̶naañ : — ¿ Nej mu̶baad da'a yaj'agapxtúky nu̶kxy adayaaba ja'ay kya'anu̶u̶be̱jtku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios tu̶ myooyu̶gu̶xy je̱'e̱ y'Espíritu Santo du'un neby u̶u̶ch ajtu̶m ajku̶xyu̶ñ ?
44010048	Chi je̱'e̱ Pedro ñu̶maayu̶gu̶xy ko wan nu̶u̶be̱jtku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesucristo xyu̶u̶ju̶ñ . Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Pedro mu̶waandaaky mu̶nukxtaaky ajku̶xy ko wan tu'kxu̶u̶ me̱jtzxu̶u̶ jakwu̶'u̶mu̶'u̶y mu̶u̶d je̱' ajku̶xy .
44011001	Je̱'e̱ apóstolestu̶jk y je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim Judea ajku̶xy , myu̶doogu̶x je̱'e̱ ayuuk du'un ko je̱'e̱ ja'ay ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch ajku̶xy je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt najty tu̶ ku'ubu̶jkku̶xy .
44011002	Peru̶ ko je̱'e̱ Pedro jim Jerusalén wyimbijty , chi je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay nije̱' y'oju̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ kostumbre janch mu̶jpu̶daakku̶xpu̶ñ , du'un neby je̱'e̱ y'ung y'ana'k tu̶y'ajtu̶u̶ygyu̶xyu̶ñ .
44011003	Chi yajtu̶u̶gu̶xy : — ¿ Ti je̱'e̱ ja'ay ko oy tu̶ mgu'ixy tu̶ mu̶gapxy je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch ajku̶xy , y tu̶ mgay tu̶ m'u'uky mu̶u̶d je̱' ajku̶xy ?
44011004	Chi je̱'e̱ Pedro ku̶xyu̶ yajmu̶dmu̶dyaaktaayu̶ ajku̶xy du'un neby najty tu̶ tyuñ tu̶ jyadyiiju̶ñ , y ñu̶maayu̶ ajku̶xy :
44011005	— Jim u̶u̶ch najty nDios'o'owu̶dáty ma je̱'e̱ Jope kajptu̶ñ , ko u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ Dios du'un xyaj'ijxy : N'ijxyu̶ch neby tu'ug mu̶j poob wit tzajpjooty chooñu̶ñ , kyu̶da'agy ma u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ nwinduuyu̶ñ , xyóchu̶ch mu̶dax'it majaty je̱'e̱ tyaatzku̶ñ .
44011006	Ko u̶u̶ch nimu̶jwa'ky n'ixa'añu̶ch tii jiibyu̶ñ , chi u̶u̶ch n'ijxy janch may no'on ju̶yujk , jiiby najty no'on ju̶yujk mu̶daaxpu̶ kyu̶'u̶ tyeky ajku̶xy y je̱'e̱ awa'an ju̶yujk ajku̶xy , tza'añdy ajku̶xy y joon muuxy ajku̶xy .
44011007	Y chi u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ ayuuk tu'ug nmu̶dooy xyñu̶ma'ayu̶ch : ‘ Pedro , pu̶du̶'u̶g ; yaj'o'og yu̶'u̶ no'on ju̶yujk y tzu'udz ju̶kx miich yu̶'u̶ . ’
44011008	Chi u̶u̶ch n'adzooy : ‘ Ka'p Windzú̶n , nimu̶naaxu̶u̶ u̶u̶ch yu̶'u̶ du'umbu̶ no'on ju̶yujk nga'atzu'uchñu̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ ju̶bu̶ku̶ñ y mu̶dyiibu̶ ka'p ñigu'udúkyu̶chu̶ñ nu̶kxy je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay tzu'tzku̶xy . ’
44011009	Chi je̱'e̱ mu̶me̱jtz'ookpu̶ ayuuk tzajpjootypyu̶ chooñ xyñu̶maayu̶ch : ‘ Je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios tu̶ yajwa'achu̶ñ , ka'p miich je̱'e̱ mu̶baad mdijy ko jyu̶bú̶ku̶ch . ’
44011010	Tu̶gu̶u̶g'ook je̱'e̱ du'un tyuunu̶ jyajtu̶ , chi je̱'e̱ poob wit tzajpjooty pya'ttu̶gu̶u̶yñu̶ .
44011011	Mu̶'it u̶u̶ch xyñija'tku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ tu̶jk ma u̶u̶ch najty n'ijtku̶xyu̶ñ tu̶gu̶u̶g kexyo'oybyu̶ , u̶u̶ch najty je̱'e̱ xy'u̶xtaaygyu̶xp , chóngu̶xy jim Cesarea .
44011012	Chi u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo xykyejxy xyñu̶maayu̶ch ko u̶u̶ch ka'p njootme̱tzku̶'u̶wu̶ch , nú̶kxu̶chu̶ch mu̶u̶d je̱' ajku̶xy . Mu̶'it u̶u̶ch nmu̶dnu̶kxy nidudujk adayaaba mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk ajku̶xy . Chi u̶u̶ch nigu̶xyu̶ ndu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ ja'ay tyu̶jku̶ñ .
44011013	Je̱'e̱ kudu̶jk u̶u̶ch xyajmu̶dmu̶dyaak ko najty je̱'e̱ ángel tu'ug tu̶ ixy , tyu̶na'ay ma je̱'e̱ tyu̶jku̶ñ , ñu̶ma'ayii : ‘ Ke̱x je̱'e̱ mja'ay nije̱' jim ma je̱'e̱ Jope kajptu̶ñ , wan je̱'e̱ Simón nu̶kxy yajtzóngu̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ nandu'un yajtijpu̶ñ Pedro .
44011014	Y je̱' xy'awaanu̶yu̶p neby je̱'e̱ Dios m'aanu̶mu̶ mu̶baad xyajni'idzooku̶yu̶ju̶ñ , miich y ku̶xyu̶ je̱'e̱ m'ung m'ana'k y je̱'e̱ mjuugy mu̶gu'ug ajku̶xy . ’
44011015	Ko u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt nyajmu̶dmu̶dyaaktu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo y'aadu̶gu̶u̶y jyoottu̶gu̶u̶yu̶ ajku̶xy , timydyu'un neby xy'adu̶gu̶u̶y xyjyoottu̶gu̶u̶y ajtu̶m ajku̶xyu̶ñ je̱'e̱ jayu̶jp'ajtpu̶ .
44011016	Mu̶'it u̶u̶ch oy nja'aymye̱jtzpaady neby je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús najty tu̶ myu̶na'añu̶ñ : ‘ Jaanch je̱'e̱ Juan ( Bautista ) ja'ay yajnu̶u̶bejty mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ nu̶u̶ , peru̶ Dios miich je̱'e̱ y'Espíritu Santo xyaj'adu̶gu̶'u̶ xyajjoottu̶gu̶'u̶wu̶p ajku̶xy . ’
44011017	Pu̶nu̶ Dios nandu'un tu̶ myo'oyii ajku̶xy je̱'e̱ ja'ay ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch ajku̶xy je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ tu̶ xymyooyu̶m ajku̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesucristo tu̶ nmu̶bu̶jku̶m ajku̶xy , ¿ pu̶n u̶u̶ch ko u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ Dios nmu̶dtziptúnu̶ch ?
44011018	Ko je̱'e̱ Jerusalénbu̶ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk je̱'e̱ Pedro y'ayuuk du'un mu̶doowu̶ ajku̶xy , chi du'uñyu̶ y'amoondaaygyu̶xy , y ja'aymye̱jtz o'owu̶dajtku̶xy je̱'e̱ Dios , myu̶naangu̶xy : — ¡ Dios du'un tu̶ myu̶na'añ ko je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch ajku̶xy nandu'un jyootwimbijtku̶xu̶ch , neby je̱'e̱ Dios mu̶baad myooyu̶gu̶xyu̶ñ je̱'e̱ wiinu̶u̶xu̶u̶bu̶ jugy'ajtu̶ñ !
44011019	Mu̶naabu̶ je̱'e̱ Esteban yaj'o'kku̶xyu̶ñ , chi je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk jim Jerusalén u̶xwu̶dijt pawu̶dijtu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy . Chi nije̱' kye̱e̱kku̶xy , ñú̶kxku̶xy Fenicia , Chipre y Antioquía . Y jim je̱'e̱ oybyu̶ ayuuk tu̶y'ajt kapxwa'kxku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ajku̶xyu̶ñ , ka'p je̱'e̱ wiingja'ay yajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xy , je'eyu̶du̶'ajty je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ajku̶xy .
44011020	Nije̱' je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ najty Chipre y Cirene tzóngu̶xpu̶ñ oy jya'tku̶xy jim Antioquía , y jim je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch nandu'un yajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xy je̱'e̱ Jesús , je̱' Windzú̶n oybyu̶ y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt .
44011021	Y je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios je̱'e̱ mu̶k'ajtu̶ñ najty mooyu̶p ajku̶xy , y may je̱'e̱ ja'ay jyu̶bu̶kwinma'añ u̶xmajtzku̶xy y mu̶bu̶jkku̶xy je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt .
44011022	Ko je̱'e̱ Jerusalénbu̶ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk adaa ayuuk du'un mu̶dooy ajku̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ Bernabé jim Antioquía kejxy ajku̶xy .
44011023	Ko je̱'e̱ Bernabé jim jya'ty , chi ijxy neby je̱'e̱ Dios oy'ajtu̶ñ najty tu̶ tuñu̶ñ , y chi xyooñ y'ijty . Chi nigu̶xyu̶ wyingapx jyu̶jpkapxu̶u̶yu̶gu̶xy ko wan tu'ug'aa tu'ugjoot kuydyuungu̶xy je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt y ka'p y'u̶xtu̶gu̶'u̶wa'kku̶xu̶ch .
44011024	Je̱' ko janch oyjya'ay je̱'e̱ Bernabé ijty , y myu̶dajtpy najty je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo y je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jk'ajtu̶ñ . Y may je̱'e̱ ja'ay mu̶bu̶jkku̶xy je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt .
44011025	Ko adaa du'un tyuunu̶ jyajtu̶ , chi je̱'e̱ Bernabé je̱'e̱ Saulo oy u̶xta'ay jim Tarso ,
44011026	y ko paaty , chi Antioquía mu̶dnu̶kxy . Jim ka'pxy tu'kjumu̶jt y'ijtku̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk , yaj'u̶xpu̶jkku̶xy je̱'e̱ mayjya'ay . Jim Antioquía jayu̶jp'ajt yajxu̶u̶mooygyu̶xy cristianos , je̱'e̱ ja'ay mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Jesús mu̶bu̶jkku̶xpu̶ñ .
44011027	Je̱'e̱ mu̶'it tiempo je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuknajtzkapxu̶u̶ybyu̶du̶jk nije̱' chóngu̶xy jim Jerusalén , y ñú̶kxku̶xy jim Antioquía .
44011028	Y chi nidu'ugtu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Agabo tyu̶naayu̶'ky mayjya'ayjyooty , y chi je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo yajkápxu̶ , myu̶naañ ko je̱'e̱ mu̶j'yuu najty ñaaxku̶da'aga'añ ma je̱'e̱ naaxwiimbu̶ kú̶xyu̶ju̶ñ . Y jaanch je̱'e̱ du'un jyajtu̶ mu̶naabu̶ je̱'e̱ Romano mu̶j'ane̱'e̱mbu̶ Claudio najty y'ane'emyu̶ñ .
44011029	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk jim Antioquía kapxy'ajtku̶xy ko je̱'e̱ pube̱jtu̶ñ ke̱xaangu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ myu̶gu'ugtu̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ jim Judea tzu̶naaygyu̶xpu̶ñ , du'un neby pu̶n nidu'ug nidu'ug ye̱ga'añu̶ñ .
44011030	Y du'un tuuñ ajku̶xy , je̱'e̱ Bernabé mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Saulo je̱'e̱ meeñ yajmu̶gue̱jxku̶x je̱'e̱ tu̶u̶bu̶ najty myuky ma je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk tuungmu̶u̶dpu̶ ajku̶xyu̶ñ jim Judea .
44012001	Mu̶'it tiempo je̱'e̱ ane̱'e̱mbu̶ Herodes yaj'u̶xwu̶dijt yajpawu̶dijttu̶gu̶u̶yu̶ nije̱' je̱'e̱ Jesús jya'ay .
44012002	Chi je̱'e̱ ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ yejky ko je̱'e̱ Santiago wan yaj'o'ogyii pujxk espaadu̶'aam , je̱'e̱ Juan pyuya'ay ,
44012003	y ko du'un ijxy ko je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay oy du'un ku'umaaygyu̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ Pedro nandu'un yajmajtzu̶ . Je̱' adaa du'un tyuunu̶ jyajtu̶ xu̶u̶jooty , je̱'e̱ xu̶u̶ mu̶naa je̱'e̱ tzajkaagy kaaygyu̶xyu̶ñ mu̶dyiibu̶ ka'p lyevaduru̶ mu̶u̶du̶chu̶ñ .
44012004	Ko je̱'e̱ Pedro yajmajtzu̶ , chi pujxtu̶gooty yajpu̶daaku̶ , chi je̱'e̱ Herodes ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ yejky ko je̱'e̱ tziptuumbu̶ wan mu̶daaxpú̶ky kweentu̶'adyii , mu̶daaxjáty najty je̱'e̱ tziptuumbu̶ tu'kpu̶kyjyátypyu̶ ajku̶xy . Du'un najty tu̶ wyinmay ko Pascua xu̶u̶náxyñu̶ tu̶ydyuna'añ mayjya'ayjyooty .
44012005	Pedro jiiby pujxtu̶gooty najty je̱'e̱ mu̶k yajkweentu̶'áty , peru̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk janch Dios mu̶bu̶jktzo'adu̶u̶tzku̶xp je̱'e̱ najty mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Pedro kyu̶xpu̶ .
44012006	Je̱'e̱ mu̶'it koodz ka'anu̶ najty xyu̶u̶mu̶'u̶y , je̱'e̱ kujaboom mu̶naa je̱'e̱ Herodes je̱'e̱ Pedro najty tu̶ydyuna'añ mayjya'ayjyooty . Pedro maab je̱'e̱ najty kuwu̶u̶ñ mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ cadeenu̶ me̱tzk ma je̱'e̱ tziptuumbu̶tu̶jk nime̱tzk ajku̶xyu̶ñ , y je̱'e̱ ja'adu'kpú̶kypyu̶ tziptuumbu̶tu̶jk pujxtu̶jk'aguuy najty je̱'e̱ kyweentu̶'ajtku̶xy ,
44012007	chi janch amoñygyu̶joot je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'ángel tu'ug ñayyajni'igu̶xu̶'ku̶ , y yaj'anu̶ydyaay je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jk . Chi je̱'e̱ ángel Pedro tijyu'kxy ma je̱'e̱ kyachu̶ñ , yajma'aybyu̶du̶'ky , y nu̶maay : “ ¡ Pu̶du̶'u̶g mu̶k'eemby ! ” Y chi je̱'e̱ cadeenu̶ mu̶k'eemby kya'adaay ma je̱'e̱ Pedro kyu̶'u̶ju̶ñ .
44012008	Y chi je̱'e̱ ángel ñu̶maayu̶ : “ Yajtu̶gu̶'u̶ yu̶'u̶ mwit y yajtu̶gu̶'u̶ yu̶'u̶ mgu̶'u̶g . ” Ko je̱'e̱ Pedro kyu̶'u̶g yajtu̶gu̶u̶ydyaay , y chi je̱'e̱ ángel jyaktimyñu̶maayu̶ : “ Yajtu̶gu̶'u̶ yu̶'u̶ mni'ijé̱n y pajaamgu̶ch . ”
44012009	Chi je̱'e̱ Pedro pyujxtu̶jkpu̶dzu̶u̶my u̶x'aam , jayu̶jp je̱'e̱ ángel ñu̶kxy , y ni ka'anejwu̶'u̶y pu̶nu̶ jaanch je̱'e̱ du'un mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ ángel najty tyuumbyu̶ñ ; kumaab ndijy najty je̱'e̱ du'un .
44012010	Chi ñajxku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ mu̶du'kpú̶kypyu̶ kweentu̶'ajtpu̶ ajku̶xyu̶ñ , y chi jyaknú̶kxku̶xy oy je̱'e̱ mu̶me̱jtzpú̶kypyu̶ paatku̶xy . Y ko oy jya'tku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ mu̶jpujxtu̶jk'aaju̶ñ , je̱'e̱ mu̶jtu'uba'abu̶ , chi je̱'e̱ mu̶jpujxtu̶jk'aa ku̶'u̶m y'awaach . Chi pyu̶dzu̶u̶mgu̶xy , y tu̶ najty tu'ug tyu'uni'inajxku̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Pedro je̱'e̱ ángel oy pyuyo'oydyuuttu̶nu̶ .
44012011	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Pedro wyinma'añ myiiñ myejch , chi myu̶naañ : “ Jada'achám nejwu̶u̶ybyu̶ch ko jaanch adaa du'un ko je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'ángel tu̶ kexy neby u̶u̶ch xyñiwa'anu̶chu̶ñ ma je̱'e̱ Heródesu̶ñ y ku̶xyu̶ neby u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay najty xytyuna'añu̶ñ ajku̶xy . ”
44012012	Ko je̱'e̱ Pedro jyoot wyinma'añ myiiñ myejch , chi ñu̶kxy ma je̱'e̱ María tyu̶jku̶ñ , je̱'e̱ Juan tyaj , je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ nandu'un yajtijpu̶ñ Marcos , ma najty je̱'e̱ mayjya'ay tu̶ ñaymyujku̶gu̶xy Dios mu̶bu̶jktzoobu̶ .
44012013	Chi je̱'e̱ tu̶jk'agu̶'u̶ kojxnojky , je̱'e̱ tu'uba'abu̶ , chi to'oxy'ana'k tu'ug pyu̶dzu̶u̶my mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Rode , ok'ixa'añ pu̶n je̱'e̱ tu̶jk'agu̶'u̶ najty kojxnojkpu̶ñ .
44012014	Ko je̱'e̱ Pedro yo'kmu̶dooy , y ka'p je̱'e̱ tu̶jk yaj'awaach , mu̶'it po'oyu̶'u̶gyu̶ ñu̶kxy tu̶gooty xoonu̶p ijtu̶p oy nigapxy ko je̱'e̱ Pedro najty jiiby tu̶ba'ay .
44012015	Chi je̱'e̱ Rode mayjya'ay ñu̶maayu̶ : — ¡ Mlooku̶ju̶u̶by miich da'a ! Peru̶ je̱' mu̶naan'adu̶u̶tzp najty je̱' ko jaanch jye̱'e̱ju̶ch . Y je̱'e̱ ja'ay mu̶naan'adu̶u̶tzku̶xpu̶py : — Ka'p yu̶'u̶ jye̱'e̱ju̶ch , je̱'e̱ y'aanu̶mu̶ yu̶'u̶ da'a .
44012016	Cham je̱'e̱ Pedro tu̶jk'agu̶'u̶ najty janch kojx'adu̶'u̶ch . Y ko yaj'awaatzku̶xy y ijxku̶xy , chi mu̶k jyanchtzu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy .
44012017	Peru̶ chi je̱'e̱ kyu̶'u̶ yaj'ijxu̶ ajku̶xy ko wan amoongu̶xy , y chi yajmu̶dmu̶dyaaku̶gu̶xy neby je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios najty pujxtu̶gooty tu̶ yajpu̶dzu̶myiiju̶ñ . Y chi jyakmu̶naañ : — Nu̶kx adaa du'un yajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶x je̱'e̱ Santiago y mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk ajku̶xy . Chi choñ y ñu̶kxy ma je̱'e̱ wiingpu̶ kajptu̶ñ .
44012018	Ko xyu̶u̶mu̶u̶y jyobu̶u̶y , mu̶'it je̱'e̱ tziptuumbu̶tu̶jk yaaxtu̶gu̶u̶y jyojktu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy wyinmaay'awu̶dijtku̶xy , je̱' ko ka'p najty nejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xy tii tu̶ tyuñ tu̶ jyadyii mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Pedro .
44012019	Chi je̱'e̱ Herodes ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ yejky ko je̱'e̱ Pedro wan nu̶kxy yaj'u̶xta'ay , y ko kya'ayajpaaty , chi je̱'e̱ tziptuumbu̶tu̶jk yajmu̶gubejty ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Pedro najty tu̶ kyweentu̶'adyiiju̶ñ ; yejky je̱'e̱ ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ ko wan nu̶kxy yaj'o'ogyii ajku̶xy . Ko najty adaa du'un tu̶ y'oktúñ y'okjadyii , mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Herodes jim Judea choñ y oy jim Cesarea chu̶naaydyaakpú̶ky .
44012020	Herodes jyanchmu̶jootma'typy najty je̱'e̱ ja'ay mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim Tiro y Sidón tzu̶naaygyu̶xpu̶ñ . Chi je̱'e̱ tiro ja'ay y sidón ja'ay ñaygyápxu̶gu̶xy neby je̱'e̱ Herodes mu̶baad winguwa'agu̶u̶ygyu̶xyu̶ñ . Y myu̶madaakku̶x ko je̱'e̱ Blasto meeñymyooygyu̶xy , je̱'e̱ ane̱'e̱mbu̶ Herodes myu̶jtuungmu̶u̶dpu̶ , y chi mu̶ju̶u̶ydyaak mu̶nukxtaakku̶xy ko je̱'e̱ tzip ma'ad wan ku̶jxnu̶ najxnu̶ , je̱' ko je̱'e̱ tiro ja'ay y je̱'e̱ sidón ja'ay je̱'e̱ xu̶jk mook najty jim yajtzóngu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ mu̶j'ane̱'e̱mbu̶ ñaaxjootyu̶ñ .
44012021	Chi je̱'e̱ Herodes xu̶u̶ tzuu agapxy mu̶naa najty je̱'e̱ ja'ay mu̶dkapx mu̶dmu̶dya'agaangu̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ mu̶j'ane̱'e̱mbu̶ wit yajtu̶gu̶u̶y , y ñaxwech ma je̱'e̱ y'u̶ñaydyaaktu̶ñ , chi je̱'e̱ mayjya'ay mu̶dmu̶dyaaktu̶gu̶u̶y .
44012022	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ mayjya'ay mu̶k yaaxtu̶gu̶u̶y jyojktu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy , y myu̶naangu̶xy : “ ¡ Adaa ja'ay mu̶dyiibu̶ yam kapxpu̶ñ , ka'p yu̶'u̶ jya'ayu̶ch , dios yu̶'u̶ ! ”
44012023	Y timymyu̶'ityu̶ je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'ángel je̱'e̱ Herodes yajpa'ambejty , je̱' ko ka'p najty je̱'e̱ Dios tu̶ ku'umáy tu̶ windzu̶gu̶'u̶y . Y chi tyu̶u̶ngku'udzu'tzu̶ .
44012024	Je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt mayu̶y'adu̶u̶tzp najty je̱' y yajkapxwa'kx'adu̶u̶tzp najty ma je̱'e̱ naax kajpt kú̶xyu̶ju̶ñ .
44012025	Ko je̱'e̱ Bernabé mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Saulo tyuung yajmaaygyu̶xy jim Jerusalén , mu̶'it jim chóngu̶xnu̶ y mu̶dnú̶kxku̶xy je̱'e̱ Juan jim Antioquía , je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ nandu'un yajtijpu̶ñ Marcos .
44013001	Ma je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ mu̶bu̶jkku̶xpu̶ñ je̱'e̱ Jesús jim Antioquía , jim najty je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuknajtzkapxu̶u̶ybyu̶du̶jk y mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt yaj'u̶xpu̶jkku̶xpu̶ñ . Jim najty je̱'e̱ Bernabé , je̱'e̱ Simón ( mu̶dyiibu̶ najty nandu'un tyijku̶xypyu̶ñ je̱'e̱ tzixyjya'ay ) , je̱'e̱ Lucio mu̶dyiibu̶ jim Cirene tzombu̶ñ , je̱'e̱ Manaén ( mu̶dyiibu̶ kipxy ye̱ku̶ñ mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Herodes , mu̶dyiibu̶ jim Galilea ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ ) y je̱'e̱ Saulo .
44013002	Du'un tu'ook , ayuu najty Dyios'o'owu̶dajtku̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo ñu̶maayu̶ ajku̶xy : “ Ju̶gue̱jxu̶gyu̶ch ajku̶xy awiing je̱'e̱ Bernabé mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Saulo neby je̱'e̱ tuung mu̶baad tuungu̶xyu̶ñ je̱'e̱ tu̶u̶bu̶ u̶u̶ch nyajniwinmayu̶u̶ygyu̶xy . ”
44013003	Ko je̱'e̱ Dios mu̶bu̶jktzodaaygyu̶xy y y'ayuu'ajttaaygyu̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk ku̶'u̶ni'ixajku̶xy je̱'e̱ Bernabé mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Saulo y chi tu'uju̶jpke̱xu̶u̶y ajku̶xy .
44013004	Ko je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo kye̱jxu̶gu̶xy je̱'e̱ Bernabé mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Saulo , chi jim Seleucia ñú̶kxku̶xy , y jim byarcu̶tu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ñú̶kxku̶xy jim Chipre ma je̱'e̱ naax mejy'agujkpu̶ju̶ñ .
44013005	Ko jim jya'tku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ barco ni'igu̶daaktaakt mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Salamina , chi je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt jim kapxwa'kxtu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ñaymyujktaakt ajku̶xyu̶ñ . Tzooñ najty je̱'e̱ Juan nandu'un , mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Bernabé y je̱'e̱ Saulo najty pube̱jtu̶bu̶ñ ajku̶xy .
44013006	Wu̶dijttaaygyu̶x ku̶xyu̶ ma je̱'e̱ naax mejy'agujkpu̶ju̶ñ , y chi oy jya'tku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ kajpt mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Pafos . Jim je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay tu'ug paaty ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Barjesús , kuxu̶u̶'ajtp najty je̱' y nan ñaydyijyii najty ko Dios y'ayuuknajtzkapxu̶u̶ybyu̶ju̶ch , y ka'p ñi'ijaanchu̶chpyu̶ .
44013007	Je̱'e̱ kuxu̶u̶ja'ay oy najty je̱'e̱ Sergio Paulo janch mu̶dnaymyu̶gu'ug'adyii , je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim ane̱'e̱mb ma je̱'e̱ jimbu̶ kajptu̶ñ , y janch kuwinma'añ je̱'e̱ najty . Chi je̱'e̱ Sergio Paulo je̱'e̱ Bernabé y mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Saulo oy yajwoyii , amdo'idaanu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt .
44013008	Peru̶ je̱'e̱ kuxu̶u̶ja'ay , mu̶dyiibu̶ nandu'un griego'eemby yajtijpu̶ñ Elimas , myu̶dzibu̶u̶y je̱'e̱ Bernabé mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Saulo , y y'agapxu̶u̶y je̱'e̱ gobernador ka'pu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt mu̶bu̶jku̶yu̶ch .
44013009	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Saulo , mu̶dyiibu̶ Pablo nandu'un yajtijpu̶ñ , mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo myu̶k'ajtu̶ñ windu̶kxpejty je̱'e̱ kuxu̶u̶ja'ay ,
44013010	y nu̶maay : — ¡ Miich oy miich mjanch'anu̶u̶ju̶ch y mjanchju̶bu̶kja'ayu̶ch , mu̶jku'u'úng miich , y mjanchmu̶dzip'aty ku̶xyu̶ pu̶njaty je̱'e̱ oyjyoot oywyinma'añ mu̶dajtku̶xpu̶ñ ! ¿ Mu̶naa m'u̶xmadza'añ neby je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios ñu̶u̶ tyu'u mjanchyajku'udu̶goya'añu̶ñ ?
44013011	Cham je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios xychaachtyuna'añ : mwu̶'u̶mu̶p wiindz , y ka'p je̱'e̱ xu̶u̶mbu̶ mdzojk'ijxu̶'u̶gu̶ch . Chi je̱'e̱ kuxu̶u̶ja'ay mu̶k'eemby wiindz wyu̶'u̶my , y chi u̶xtaay pu̶n wijtzwu̶dittu̶u̶wu̶bu̶ñ je̱' ko wiindz je̱'e̱ najtyu̶ñ .
44013012	Ko je̱'e̱ gobernador du'un ijxy , chi je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt mu̶bu̶jku̶yu̶ , y yajnú̶kxy yajju̶wu̶u̶y mu̶k neby je̱'e̱ Pablo je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'u̶xpu̶jku̶ñ nimu̶dyaaku̶ju̶ñ .
44013013	Chi je̱'e̱ Pablo byarcu̶tu̶gu̶u̶y mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ myu̶gu'ugtu̶jk jim Pafos y ñú̶kxku̶xy jim Perge ma je̱'e̱ Panfilia ñaaxjootyu̶ñ ; peru̶ puyo'oydyuuttu̶nu̶ je̱'e̱ Juan y wyimbijtnu̶ jim Jerusalén .
44013014	Najx jim Perge ajku̶xy , oy jya'tku̶xy jim Antioquía , mu̶wingón je̱'e̱ Pisidia naaxjooty . Pokxyxyu̶u̶ jim tyu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ñaymyujktaakt ajku̶xyu̶ñ y chi ñaxwé̱tzku̶xy .
44013015	Ko je̱'e̱ ja'ay ñakykyapxtaay ajku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ Moisés ñakyu̶ñ y ma je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuknajtzkapxu̶u̶ybyu̶du̶jk ñaky ajku̶xyu̶ñ , chi je̱'e̱ naymyujktaakt windzu̶ndu̶jk ayuuk ke̱jxku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ Pablo najty y'u̶ñaaygyu̶xyu̶ñ : — Mu̶gu'uktu̶jk pu̶nu̶ mu̶dajtku̶xypy je̱'e̱ kapxwiju̶ñ mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ ja'ay ajku̶xy , mu̶baad cham mnigápxku̶xy .
44013016	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Pablo tyu̶naayu̶'ky , chi je̱'e̱ kyu̶'u̶ yaj'ijxu̶ ajku̶xy ko y'amoongu̶xu̶ch , y myu̶naañ : — Okmu̶doogu̶x , miich Israel ja'ay ajku̶xy , y nandu'un miich ajku̶xy ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch , mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios windzu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xpu̶ñ .
44013017	Je̱'e̱ Israel ja'ay Dyios jékyu̶p win'ijx je̱'e̱ nmu̶j'áp nmu̶jteedy ajtu̶m ajku̶xy , y yajnimayu̶u̶ygyu̶x ni'igyu̶ ko najty jim Egipto jyaybyokxy'ajtku̶xyñu̶ , y chi kujeky yajpu̶dzu̶u̶mu̶gu̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ myu̶k'ajtu̶ñ ma je̱'e̱ jimbu̶ naaxu̶ñ .
44013018	Mu̶me̱kxtujku̶ je̱'e̱ Dios ajku̶xy jii da'a juxytyikxy jumu̶jtu̶ jim adu'ugtuum ,
44013019	y juxtujk it je̱'e̱ Dios naax kajpt jim Canaán naaxjooty yajtu̶gooy neby je̱'e̱ nmu̶j'áp nmu̶jteedy ajtu̶m ajku̶xy ñaax du'un yajmooygyu̶xu̶chu̶ñ , neby jim mu̶baad chu̶naaygyu̶xyu̶ñ .
44013020	Jii najty da'a tu̶ y'ijtnu̶ mu̶daaxk mu̶go'px ja'akúpt jumu̶jtu̶ . “ Y mu̶'itnu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios ane̱'e̱mbu̶ myooyu̶ ajku̶xy u̶xtu̶ koonu̶ je̱'e̱ Samuel , je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuknajtzkapxu̶u̶ybyu̶ tyuungtzu̶mu̶'ky .
44013021	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ ane̱'e̱mbu̶ tu'ug yujkwaañ ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ ane̱'e̱mu̶wu̶bu̶ñ ajku̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ Dios ane̱'e̱mbu̶ tu'ug myooyu̶gu̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Saúl je̱'e̱ Cis y'ung , je̱'e̱ Benjamín y'ok'ung y'ok'ana'k , je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ juxytyikxy jumu̶jt tuunu̶ñ .
44013022	Kujeky je̱'e̱ Dios je̱'e̱ Saúl tuungpu̶jky , y pu̶daaky je̱'e̱ David ko y'ane̱'e̱mu̶ch , je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ ñigapxu̶ñ , myu̶naañ : ‘ Tu̶ u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ David nbaady , je̱'e̱ Isaí y'ung , tu'ug je̱'e̱ ja'ay mu̶dyiibu̶ u̶u̶ch ngu'umaabyu̶ñ y mu̶dyiibu̶ ku̶xyu̶ kuydyuunda'awu̶bu̶ñ neby u̶u̶ch ndzokyu̶ñ . ’
44013023	Nidu'ugtu̶ je̱'e̱ David y'ok'ung y'ok'ana'k , je̱' je̱' je̱'e̱ Jesús mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios kye̱jxu̶ñ ko je̱'e̱ Israel ja'ay niwa'anu̶ch yajtzo'ogu̶ch ajku̶xy , du'un neby najty jékyu̶p tu̶ yajwinwaanu̶'u̶yii ajku̶xy .
44013024	Ka'anu̶ najty je̱'e̱ Jesús myiñ , ko je̱'e̱ Juan Bautista kapxwa'kxy je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt ma je̱'e̱ Israel ja'ay ku̶xyu̶ ajku̶xyu̶ñ , nu̶maaygyu̶xy ko tzipku̶xp wan jootwimbijtku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ Diosu̶ñ y mu̶'it ñu̶u̶be̱jtku̶xu̶ch .
44013025	Ko je̱'e̱ Juan Bautista y'o'ku̶ñ najty wyingoonu̶ , chi myu̶naañ : ‘ U̶u̶ch ka'p u̶u̶ch nje̱'e̱ju̶ch je̱'e̱ Cristo , du'un neby miich mja'amu̶naangu̶xyu̶ñ , peru̶ jak'u̶x'aam je̱'e̱ ja'ay tu'ug myiina'añ y u̶u̶ch ka'p u̶u̶ch xypyaady ngue̱ju̶chu̶ch je̱'e̱ kyu̶'u̶gwiin . ’
44013026	“ Mu̶gu'uktu̶jk ajku̶xy , Abraham y'ok'ungtu̶jk y'ok'ana'ktu̶jk , y miich ajku̶xy ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios windzu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xpu̶ñ : miich je̱'e̱ Dios adaa ayuuk tu̶y'ajt tu̶ xyajnigue̱jxku̶xy je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ aanu̶mu̶ ni'idzooku̶ñ ye̱jkpu̶ñ .
44013027	Je̱'e̱ ja'ay mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim Jerusalén tzu̶naaygyu̶xpu̶ñ , y mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ wyindzu̶ndu̶jk ajku̶xy , ka'p najty je̱'e̱ nejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xy pu̶n je̱'e̱ Jesús najtyu̶ñ , y nan ka'p je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuknajtzkapxu̶u̶ybyu̶du̶jk y'ayuuk najty winju̶wu̶u̶yu̶ ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ najty ja'ayajkápxp ma je̱'e̱ ñaymyujktaakt ajku̶xyu̶ñ pokxyxyu̶u̶ pokxyxyu̶u̶ ; y je̱' je̱'e̱ Jesús ku̶'u̶m yaj'o'kku̶x , y kuydyuungu̶xy du'un neby je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuknajtzkapxu̶u̶ybyudu̶jk najty tu̶ kujaaygu̶xyu̶ñ ma je̱'e̱ Dios ñakyu̶ñ .
44013028	Y oy je̱'e̱ pyoky kyu̶dyeey ka'apaattu̶ ajku̶xy neby mu̶baad yaj'o'kku̶xyu̶ñ , chi ni'anukxu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ Pilátoju̶ñ ko wan nu̶kxy yaj'o'ogyii .
44013029	Ko du'un ku̶xyu̶ kuydyuundaaygyu̶xy neby najty kyuja'ayu̶chu̶ñ ma je̱'e̱ Dios ñakyu̶ñ mu̶u̶d je̱' gyu̶xpu̶ , chi cruutzkú̶xp yajmu̶najky ajku̶xy y oy yajnaaxtu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy .
44013030	Peru̶ Dios je̱'e̱ Jesús yajjuugypyu̶jk ko najty tu̶ y'o'ogy .
44013031	Chi ka'anaag'ook ñayyajni'igu̶xu̶'ku̶ ma je̱'e̱ myu̶gu'ugtu̶jk ajku̶xyu̶ñ mu̶dyiibu̶ najty tu̶ mu̶dwu̶dityu̶ñ ko chóngu̶xy Galilea y ñú̶kxku̶xy Jerusalén , y jada'achám je̱' je̱'e̱ tu̶y'ajt du'un nigapxp nimu̶dyaakku̶xp ma je̱'e̱ ja'ay ajku̶xyu̶ñ .
44013032	“ Y du'unu̶tz miich cham nyajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xy adaa oybyu̶ ayuuk tu̶y'ajt mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios je̱'e̱ nmu̶j'áp nmu̶jteedy ajtu̶m ajku̶xy jékyu̶p yajwinwaanu̶u̶ygyu̶xu̶ñ ,
44013033	y tu̶ du'un cham kuydyúñ ma u̶u̶ch ajtu̶m ajku̶xyu̶ñ , je̱'e̱ mu̶j'áp mu̶jteedy y'ok'ungtu̶jk y'ok'ana'ktu̶jk ajku̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Jesús yajjuugypyu̶jky ko najty tu̶ y'o'ogy , du'un neby kyuja'ayu̶chu̶ñ ma je̱'e̱ Salmo naky mu̶mé̱tzkpu̶ju̶ñ , ma je̱'e̱ Dios du'un myu̶naañu̶ñ : ‘ Miich n'ung'ajtypy , u̶u̶ch miich je̱'e̱ juugy'ajtu̶ñ cham tu̶ nmo'oy . ’
44013034	Tu̶ najty je̱'e̱ Dios du'un myu̶na'añ ko je̱'e̱ Jesús yajjuugypyú̶gu̶ch , ka'pu̶ je̱'e̱ ñi'kx wyindu̶góyu̶ch , ko jiiby du'un myu̶na'añ ma je̱'e̱ ñakyu̶ñ : ‘ Nmo'owe̱e̱mby miich je̱'e̱ kunukxu̶ñ ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ David nyajwinwaanu̶u̶yu̶ñ . ’
44013035	Paady nandu'un kuja'ay ja'adu'k'ít myiñ ma du'un myu̶na'añu̶ñ : ‘ Ka'p m'a'ixu̶'u̶wu̶ch nu̶kxy je̱'e̱ mduumbu̶ ñi'kx wyindu̶goy , je̱'e̱ mduumbu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ jyoot wyinma'añ oy wa'adz mu̶u̶du̶ñ . ’
44013036	Jaanch je̱' ko je̱'e̱ David jyuugy myu̶gu'ug ane'emy neby je̱'e̱ Dios najty tu̶ yajni'ipu̶gyiiju̶ñ , y ko kujeky y'o'knu̶ y ko je̱'e̱ y'aanu̶mu̶ ñaybyaattu̶ mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ myu̶j'áp myu̶jteedy y'aanu̶mu̶ ajku̶xy , y ko je̱'e̱ ñi'kx ku̶xyu̶ wyindu̶gooydyaay .
44013037	Peru̶ je̱'e̱ Jesús mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios yajjuugypyu̶jku̶ñ ka'p ñi'kx je̱'e̱ wyindu̶gooy .
44013038	“ Mu̶gu'uktu̶jk ajku̶xy , mu̶baad miich mnejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ pokywyinme̱kxu̶ñ yaj'u̶u̶wa'kxy yajkapxwa'kxy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Jesús kyu̶xpu̶ .
44013039	Y mu̶u̶d je̱' gyu̶xpu̶ ku̶xyu̶ pu̶njaty mu̶bu̶jkku̶xpu̶ñ yajwinmé̱kxp pyoky kyu̶dyeey je̱'e̱ ku̶xyu̶ ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Moisés y'ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ najty ka'p winmekxyu̶ñ .
44013040	Naygyweentu̶'ajtu̶gu̶x , ka'pu̶ je̱'e̱ ayo'on xyñimiingu̶xu̶ch neby je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuknajtzkapxu̶u̶ybyu̶du̶jk jékyu̶p kujaaygyu̶xyu̶ñ , ko je̱'e̱ Dios du'un myu̶naañ :
44013041	‘ Mu̶doowu̶gyu̶ch je̱'e̱ n'ayuuk ajku̶xy , miich nixiikpu̶ yajxiikpu̶ ajku̶xy , nay'adzu̶gu̶u̶yu̶gu̶x , y ix miich je̱'e̱ m'aanu̶mu̶ myajtu̶gooygyu̶x . Je̱' ko u̶u̶ch Dios ndúnu̶byu̶ch je̱'e̱ mu̶jwinma'añ , ma je̱'e̱ mxu̶u̶ mjumu̶jt miich ajku̶xyu̶ñ . May mga'amu̶bu̶jkku̶xu̶ch , oy pu̶n xyjya'ayajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xu̶ch . ’ ”
44013042	Ko je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ myu̶gu'ugtu̶jk pyu̶dzu̶u̶mgu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ñaymyujktaakt ajku̶xyu̶ñ , chi je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch ajku̶xy ñu̶maayu̶gu̶xy ko wan je̱'e̱ ja'adu'ukpu̶ pokxyxyu̶u̶ nandu'un yajmu̶dmu̶dya'agyii ajku̶xy .
44013043	Ko yo'oywya'kxku̶xnu̶ ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ñaymyujktaakt ajku̶xyu̶ñ , may je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay y je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay y'u̶xpu̶jku̶ñ ju̶jptu̶gu̶yu̶u̶ygyu̶xu̶ñ oy panú̶kxku̶xy je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé . Chi je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé wyingapx jyu̶jpkapxu̶u̶yu̶ ajku̶xy ko je̱'e̱ tu̶y'ajt wan panú̶kxku̶xy du'un neby je̱'e̱ Dios may'ajt najty tu̶ tuñu̶ñ mu̶u̶d je̱' gyu̶xpu̶ ajku̶xy , y ko ka'p nimu̶naaxu̶u̶ u̶xmajtzku̶xu̶ch .
44013044	Ko je̱'e̱ ja'adu'ukpu̶ pokxyxyu̶u̶ paaty , chi je̱'e̱ ja'ay ñayyo'oymyujku̶ ajku̶xy , y ja'awe̱e̱n je̱'e̱ naax kajpt kya'anu̶kxtaaygyu̶xy , janch amdo'idaangu̶xy je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt .
44013045	Peru̶ ko je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay je̱'e̱ mayjya'ay ijxku̶xy , chi ku̶jx jyoot'ambu̶jktaaygyu̶xy y myu̶naangu̶xy ko du'un ka'p tyu̶y'ajtu̶ch neby je̱'e̱ Pablo myu̶na'añu̶ñ , nu̶maaygyu̶xy oy nejpy .
44013046	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé aamú̶k jootmú̶k kyapxtu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy y'adzoowu̶gu̶xy : — U̶u̶ch ajku̶xy tzipku̶xp miich je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt najty jayu̶jp nyajmu̶dmu̶dya'agaangu̶xy miich judío ja'ay ajku̶xy , peru̶ je̱' ko ka'p miich mgu'ubu̶gaangu̶xy y ka'p tu'uda'agy mnaybyu̶daaku̶gu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ jugy'ajt wiinu̶u̶xu̶u̶bu̶ju̶ñ , nú̶kxyu̶ch je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch n'okyajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xy .
44013047	Je̱' ko du'un u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios xykyje̱xku̶xy y xyñu̶maayu̶ch ajku̶xy :
44013048	Ko du'un mu̶doogu̶xy je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶chu̶ñ ajku̶xy , chi jyootkugu̶u̶ygyu̶xy y myu̶naandu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt najty y'óyu̶ch ; y nigu̶xyu̶ mu̶bu̶jktaaygyu̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios najty tu̶ yajnigu'udugu̶'u̶y ko je̱'e̱ jugy'ajt wiinu̶u̶xu̶u̶bu̶ paatku̶xu̶ch .
44013049	Y du'un je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt jim yajkapxwa'kxy ma je̱'e̱ jimbu̶ naax kajpt kú̶xyu̶ju̶ñ .
44013050	Peru̶ chi je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay mu̶dnaygyápxu̶gu̶xy je̱'e̱ tu'uda'agypyu̶ to'oxyu̶jktu̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios yajmu̶j'ajtku̶xpu̶ñ y mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ kajptja'ay yajmu̶j'ajtku̶xypyu̶ñ , y mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ jimbu̶ mu̶kja'aydyu̶jk ma je̱'e̱ jimbu̶ kajptu̶ñ , y je̱' mu̶u̶d mu̶bu̶du̶'ktaakku̶xy je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé ko pawojpke̱'e̱gaangu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ jimbu̶ naaxjootyu̶ñ .
44013051	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé kyu̶'u̶g winwojpku̶xy . Je̱' je̱'e̱ tu̶y'ajt ko najty tu̶ ñayñi'iwaatzu̶gu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ jimbu̶ ja'ay ajku̶xyu̶ñ , y chi Iconio ñu̶kxy ajku̶xy .
44013052	Peru̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk janch jootkujk najty je̱'e̱ ajku̶xy y myu̶dajtku̶xypy je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo najty ajku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ jyoot wyinma'añ ajku̶xyu̶ñ .
44014001	Jim Iconio je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé nime̱tzk kipxy tyu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ñaymyujktaakt ajku̶xyu̶ñ , y kapxwa'kxku̶xy je̱'e̱ Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt , y janch may je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay mu̶bu̶jkku̶xy y nandu'un je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch ajku̶xy .
44014002	Peru̶ je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ ayuuk tu̶y'ajt najty ka'p mu̶bu̶jkku̶xyu̶ñ myu̶dzibu̶u̶ygyu̶x je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶chu̶ñ ajku̶xy , wan ju̶bu̶k axu̶u̶g wyinmaaygyu̶xu̶ch mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt mu̶bu̶jkku̶xu̶ñ .
44014003	Paady je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé jim jeky wyu̶'u̶mgu̶xy , y mu̶jootkujk'ajtku̶xy je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios , nimu̶dyaakku̶xy wiinu̶u̶ju̶jp je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt ko je̱'e̱ Dios xychojku̶m xyjyu̶wu̶u̶yu̶m ajku̶xy , y je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios je̱'e̱ mu̶k'ajt mooyu̶ ajku̶xy neby je̱'e̱ ijxpe̱jt y je̱'e̱ mu̶jwinma'añ mu̶baad tuungu̶xyu̶ñ mu̶dyiibu̶ ijxpe̱jt'adú̶bu̶ñ ko tyu̶y'ajtu̶ch mu̶dyiibu̶ kyapxypy myu̶dyaakypyu̶ñ ajku̶xy .
44014004	Peru̶ je̱'e̱ kajptja'ay me̱jtzpú̶ky najty je̱'e̱ ajku̶xy , nije̱' je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay najty mu̶jpu̶daakku̶xy y nije̱' je̱'e̱ apóstolestu̶jk najty mu̶jpu̶daakku̶xy .
44014005	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ajku̶xy y nandu'un je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch ñaygyapx ñayxiiku̶gu̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ tuungmu̶u̶dpu̶du̶jk ko je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé mu̶dzibu̶'u̶waangu̶xy y timychaagu'uga'adzaangu̶xy .
44014006	Ko je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé oy du'un nejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xy , chi kye̱e̱kku̶xy y ñú̶kxku̶xy jim Listra y Derbe jim Licaonia naaxjooty , y majaty je̱'e̱ naax kajpt winduuy wingónbu̶ju̶ñ ,
44014007	y jim je̱'e̱ oybyu̶ ayuuk tu̶y'ajt nandu'un kapxwa'kxku̶xy .
44014008	Jim Listra najty ja'ay tu'ug mu̶dyiibu̶ ka'p mu̶baad yo'oyu̶ñ . Ka'p najty je̱'e̱ nimu̶naa yo'oy , je̱' ko du'un najty je̱'e̱ tu̶ tyimymya'axung'áty tekymya'at . Je̱'e̱ tekymya'atpu̶ja'ay u̶ñaaby je̱'e̱ najty ,
44014009	amdo'ity neby je̱'e̱ Pablo myu̶na'añu̶ñ , y chi je̱'e̱ Pablo je̱'e̱ tekymya'atpu̶ ja'ay windu̶kxpejty , y ijxy ko je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jku̶ñ mu̶u̶du̶ch neby mu̶baad cho'ogyu̶ñ .
44014010	Mu̶'it mu̶k nu̶maay : — ¡ Pu̶du̶'u̶g y tu̶naaygyugu̶'u̶ ! Chi je̱'e̱ tekymya'atpu̶ ja'ay tu'ktú̶py ñajtztu̶bu̶u̶y , y yo'oydyu'ubu̶jky .
44014011	Ko je̱'e̱ mayjya'ay du'un ijxku̶xy neby je̱'e̱ Pablo je̱'e̱ pa'amja'ay najty tu̶ yajtzo'ogyu̶ñ , mu̶'it yaaxtu̶gu̶u̶y jyojktu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy , mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Licaonia ayuuk myu̶naangu̶xy : — ¡ Dios du'un tu̶ kyu̶daakku̶xy neby je̱'e̱ ja'ay ma u̶u̶ch ajtu̶m ajku̶xyu̶ñ !
44014012	Y myu̶naangu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Bernabé najty je̱'e̱ dios Zeus , y je̱'e̱ Pablo je̱'e̱ dios Hermes , je̱' ko je̱' najty kapxp .
44014013	Peru̶ je̱'e̱ Zeus teedy mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim teedy'ajtp ma je̱'e̱ Zeus chajptu̶jk kajppa'abu̶ju̶ñ , je̱' je̱'e̱ waj mu̶miingu̶x y je̱'e̱ pu̶jy ujtz , y je̱' mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mayjya'ay du'un je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé najty o'owu̶dattaangu̶xy y yaj'o'ogaangu̶xy je̱'e̱ waj najty neby je̱'e̱ windzu̶gu̶'u̶ñdyu̶ñ .
44014014	Peru̶ ko je̱'e̱ Bernabé mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Pablo du'un nejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xy neby je̱'e̱ ja'ay najty y'adu̶'u̶dzaangu̶xyu̶ñ , chi je̱'e̱ wyit ku̶'u̶m agu̶u̶dzu̶u̶ygyu̶xy , tyu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy mayjya'ay agujk cham myu̶naangu̶xy :
44014015	“ Mu̶gu'uktu̶jk , ¿ ti ko du'un m'adu̶u̶tzku̶xy ? U̶u̶ch ja'ayu̶ch ajku̶xy du'un neby miich ajku̶xyu̶ñ . Paady u̶u̶ch tu̶ n'okja'amiingu̶xpu̶ ma je̱'e̱ mnaax mgajpt ajku̶xyu̶ñ , neby nnu̶ma'awaangu̶xy ko adaa du'umbu̶ winma'añ m'u̶xmajtzku̶xnu̶ch mu̶dyiibu̶ ka'p chobaady ma je̱'e̱ Diosu̶ñ , y mjootwimbijtku̶xnu̶ch ma je̱'e̱ juugypyu̶ Dios mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ tzajp yajkoju̶ñ , je̱'e̱ naaxwiimbu̶ , je̱'e̱ mejy y ku̶xyu̶ tijaty ya n'ijxu̶mbyu̶ñ .
44014016	Dios y'u̶xmajtz je̱'e̱ ja'ay jékyu̶p ko wan tuungu̶xy tii tyimychojkku̶xypyu̶ñ ,
44014017	oy je̱'e̱ tu̶y'ajt najty ja'ayéky ko je̱' Dios ; y ja'atúñ je̱'e̱ oybyu̶ najty mu̶u̶d miich kyu̶xpu̶ ajku̶xy . Dios je̱' yajtuub yajtajxp , y xymyooygyu̶xy je̱'e̱ oybyu̶ pu̶da'aky y nan xymyooygyu̶xy mu̶j ku̶je̱e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ mgaaygyu̶xu̶py m'uukku̶xu̶byu̶ñ neby mjootkujk'ajtku̶xu̶chu̶ñ .
44014018	Oy najty je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé mayjya'ay du'un ja'anu̶maaygyu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ waj ka'p yaj'o'kku̶xu̶ch ko najty wyindzu̶gu̶'u̶waanu̶gu̶xy y y'o'owu̶dattaanu̶gu̶xy , peru̶ ka'p mu̶madaakku̶xy .
44014019	Mu̶'it xu̶u̶ je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay oy nije̱' jya'tku̶xy , chóngu̶xy jim Antioquía y jim Iconio , y chi je̱'e̱ mayjya'ay nu̶maaygyu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé wan mu̶dzibu̶u̶ygyu̶xy . Chi je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶k'eemby mu̶dzibu̶u̶ygyu̶xy y ka'tzku̶xy , y du'un je̱'e̱ myu̶naangu̶xpu̶ tu̶ ndijy najty je̱'e̱ du'un yaj'o'kku̶xy , chi pawijtz papo'tku̶xy oy u̶xju̶bijpku̶xy kajppa'a .
44014020	Peru̶ ko je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk jyu'ubigu̶u̶yu̶gu̶xy , mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Pablo pyu̶du̶'ky y ñu̶kxy kajptjooty ja'adu'ook , y kujaboom choñ mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé y ñú̶kxku̶xy jim Derbe .
44014021	Ko je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé je̱'e̱ oybyu̶ ayuuk tu̶y'ajt jim Derbe kapxwa'kxku̶xy , janch may je̱'e̱ ja'ay Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt jim mu̶bu̶jkku̶xy , y chi jim Listra , jim Iconio y jim Antioquía wyimbijtku̶xnu̶bu̶ .
44014022	Jim je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk jootmu̶kmu̶gápxy ajku̶xy , y wingapx ju̶jpkapxu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ko wan tu'kju̶jp mu̶bu̶jkku̶xy je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt y ka'p y'u̶xtu̶gu̶'u̶wa'kku̶xu̶ch , nu̶maaygyu̶xy ko naty ndu̶gu̶'u̶waanu̶m ajku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ Dios y'ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ tzipku̶xp je̱'e̱ ayo'on may nmu̶najx nyajnajxu̶mu̶ch ajku̶xy .
44014023	Kajpt kajpt majaty je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk yajpaatku̶xyu̶ñ , jim je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk yajni'ibu̶jkku̶xy ko je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk wan nigu'ubajk'ajtku̶xy , y ko najty tu̶ yajni'ibu̶jktaaygyu̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ Dios mu̶bu̶jktzoogu̶xy y y'ayuu'ajtku̶xy , y chi je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios yajku̶'u̶waanu̶u̶yu̶gu̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ najty tu̶ mu̶bu̶jkku̶xyu̶ñ .
44014024	Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé najxku̶x je̱'e̱ Pisidia naaxjooty , oy jim Panfilia naaxjooty jya'tku̶xy .
44014025	Kyapxwa'kxku̶x je̱'e̱ Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt jim Perge , y chi jim Atalia ñú̶kxku̶xy ;
44014026	jim byarcu̶tu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ñú̶kxku̶xy jim Antioquía ja'adu'ook , je̱'e̱ kajpt ma je̱'e̱ Dios chojku̶ñ najty tu̶ yajni'ibu̶gyiiju̶ñ ajku̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ tuung mu̶dyiibu̶ najty tu̶ yajmaaygyu̶xyu̶ñ .
44014027	Ko jim Antioquía jya'tku̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk woomujky ajku̶xy y yajmu̶dmu̶dyaaktaaygyu̶xy ku̶xyu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios najty tu̶ tuñu̶ñ mu̶u̶d je̱' ajku̶xy , y neby je̱'e̱ Dios nu̶u̶ tu'u najty tu̶ yaj'awa'achu̶ñ ma je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶chu̶ñ ajku̶xy , neby je̱'e̱ Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt mu̶baad nandu'un mu̶bu̶jkku̶xyu̶ñ .
44014028	Jeky je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé jim y'ijtku̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk ajku̶xy .
44015001	Je̱'e̱ mu̶'it tiempo je̱'e̱ ja'ay nije̱' mu̶dyiibu̶ jim Judea tzóngu̶xpu̶ñ , oy jim Antioquía jya'tku̶xy , y yaj'u̶xpu̶jktu̶gu̶u̶y je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk ajku̶xy , myu̶naangu̶xy : “ Pu̶nu̶ myajni'idzo'oge̱e̱mby je̱'e̱ m'aanu̶mu̶ ajku̶xy , tzipku̶xp myajtu̶y'ajtu̶u̶ygyu̶xu̶ch du'un neby je̱'e̱ Moisés y'ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ myu̶na'añu̶ñ .
44015002	Chi je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé mu̶k ñaywyingapx ñayjyu̶jpkápxu̶gu̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ jim Judea tzóngu̶xpu̶ñ , ka'p ñay'ayuukwinju̶wu̶u̶yu̶gu̶xy . Chi je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé y mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk nije̱' yajni'ibu̶jku̶ ajku̶xy ko wan jim Jerusalén nú̶kxku̶xy y nu̶kxy jim yajtu̶ydyu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ apóstolestu̶jk ajku̶xyu̶ñ , y nan ma je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk jim nigu'ubajk'ajtku̶xpu̶ñ .
44015003	Chi je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk kye̱jxu̶gu̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim Antioquía ajku̶xy , y chi ñajxku̶xy Fenicia naaxjooty y Samaria naaxjooty yajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xy je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk kajpt kajpt neby je̱'e̱ ja'ay ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch najty tu̶ jyootwimbijtku̶xyu̶ñ ma je̱'e̱ Diosu̶ñ , y tu̶ u̶xmajtzku̶xnu̶ najty je̱'e̱ jekywyinma'añ ajku̶xy . Y ku̶xyu̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk oy jyootkugu̶u̶ydyaaygyu̶xy mu̶u̶d adayaaba ayuuk .
44015004	Ko je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé oy jim Jerusalén jya'tku̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk y je̱'e̱ apóstolestu̶jk kyu'ubu̶jku̶ ajku̶xy y je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk najty nigu'ubajk'ajtku̶xpu̶ñ , chi ku̶xyu̶ nimu̶dyaaktaaygyu̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios najty tu̶ tuñu̶ñ mu̶u̶d je̱' ajku̶xy .
44015005	Peru̶ nije̱' je̱'e̱ fariseo ja'ay ajku̶xy , je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Jesús najty tu̶ mu̶bu̶jkku̶xyu̶ñ , tyu̶naayu̶'kku̶xy , y myu̶naangu̶xy : — Tzipku̶xp je̱'e̱ ja'ay wan yajtu̶y'ajtu̶u̶ygyu̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Jesús mu̶bu̶jkku̶xpu̶ñ je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch ajku̶xy y n'ane̱'e̱mu̶mu̶ch ajku̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Moisés y'ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ wan kuydyuungu̶xy .
44015006	Chi je̱'e̱ apóstolestu̶jk ñayyo'oymyujku̶ ajku̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk nigu'ubajk'ajtku̶xpu̶ñ , okwinmayaangu̶xy je̱'e̱ fariseo ja'ay y'ayuuk neby y'oyu̶'u̶wu̶chu̶ñ .
44015007	Ko kya'atzojk nay'ayuukwinju̶wu̶u̶yu̶ ajku̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ Pedro tyu̶naayu̶'ky , y ñu̶maayu̶ ajku̶xy : — Mu̶gu'uktu̶jk , miich mnejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xypy ko u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ Dios jékyu̶p xywyin'ijx ma miich ajku̶xyu̶ñ , neby u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ ja'ay mu̶baad nyajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xyu̶ñ je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch je̱'e̱ oybyu̶ ayuuk tu̶y'ajt mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ aanu̶mu̶ ni'idzooku̶ñ ye̱jkpu̶ñ , neby mu̶baad mu̶bu̶jkku̶xyu̶ñ .
44015008	Y Dios mu̶dyiibu̶ ijxp nejwu̶u̶by je̱'e̱ ja'ay jyoot wyinma'añ , yajni'igu̶xu̶'k ko ku'ubu̶jku̶ju̶ch ajku̶xy je̱' ko mooyu̶ je̱'e̱ y'Espíritu Santo ajku̶xy , du'un neby u̶u̶ch xymyooy ajtu̶m ajku̶xyu̶ñ .
44015009	Tu'ugyu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios tyuñ mu̶u̶d u̶u̶ch ajtu̶m ajku̶xy y mu̶u̶d je̱' ajku̶xy , y ka'p ni pu̶n pexy , nan tu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios jyoot wyinma'añ yajwaatzu̶xu̶ ajku̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Jesús tu̶ mu̶bu̶jkku̶xy .
44015010	Jada'achám , ¿ ti ko mga'awinju̶wu̶u̶ygyu̶xy y mga'amu̶bu̶gaangu̶xy neby je̱'e̱ Dios tyuñu̶ñ mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch ajku̶xy ? ¿ Ti je̱'e̱ kostumbre ko adzip myajni'ibu̶gaangu̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ ni u̶u̶ch ajtu̶m ajku̶xy y ni je̱'e̱ nmu̶j'áp nmu̶jteedy ajtu̶m ajku̶xy tu̶ ka'amu̶madaakku̶xyu̶ñ nu̶kxy kuydyuundaaygyu̶xy ?
44015011	U̶u̶ch ajtu̶m ajku̶xy nmu̶bu̶jku̶mby ko je̱'e̱ Dios n'aanu̶mu̶ ni'idzooku̶ñ ni'imay'ajtu̶ñ gyu̶xpu̶ tu̶ xymyooyu̶m ajku̶xy , je̱' ko je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús xychojku̶m xyjyu̶wu̶u̶yu̶m ajku̶xy , timydyu'un neby je̱' ajku̶xyu̶ñ .
44015012	Mu̶'it nigu̶xyu̶ y'amoondaay ajku̶xy y amdo'ijtku̶xy neby je̱'e̱ Bernabé mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Pablo nimu̶dyaakku̶xyu̶ñ je̱'e̱ ijxpe̱jt y je̱'e̱ mu̶jwinma'añ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios najty tu̶ tuñ mu̶u̶d je̱' ajku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶chu̶ñ ajku̶xy .
44015013	Ko myu̶dyaaktaaygyu̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ Santiago myu̶naañ : — Mu̶gu'uktu̶jk , u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ n'ayuuk ok'amdo'ijtu̶ky ajku̶xy .
44015014	Tu̶ je̱'e̱ Simón xyajmu̶dmu̶dyaaku̶m ajku̶xy neby je̱'e̱ Dios may'ajt jayu̶jp'ajt tu̶ tuñ ma je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶chu̶ñ ajku̶xy , ko nandu'un tu̶ win'ixy mu̶dyiibu̶ jya'ay'ade̱e̱mby ma je̱' ajku̶xyu̶ñ .
44015015	Adaa , adu̶u̶b adaa du'un mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuknajtzkapxu̶u̶ybyu̶du̶jk jékyu̶p kyujaaygyu̶xu̶ñ , neby jiiby myu̶na'añ ma je̱'e̱ Dios ñakyu̶ñ :
44015016	‘ Ko naty du'un tu̶ y'oktúñ y'okjadyii , mu̶'it u̶u̶ch ya naaxwiiñ nwinbídu̶ch , y nyaj'oyu̶'u̶wu̶byu̶ch je̱'e̱ naax kajpt ja'adu'ook , mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ David naty y'ane'embyu̶ñ , mu̶dyiibu̶ naty tu̶ tyu̶goyu̶ñ , du'un neby tu'ug tu̶jk tu̶ kyu̶dayu̶ñ ma je̱'e̱ David y'ok'ung y'ok'ana'ku̶ñ , nyaj'oyu̶'u̶wu̶byu̶ch je̱'e̱ naax kajpt ja'adu'ook du'un neby je̱'e̱ ja'ay tu̶jk yajni'idu̶gáchu̶ñ .
44015017	Wan je̱'e̱ jakjadyiiyu̶bu̶ ja'ay Dios o'owu̶dajtku̶xu̶ch , nigu̶xyu̶ kipxy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶chu̶ñ ajku̶xy , mu̶dyiibu̶ u̶u̶ch nja'ay'ade̱e̱mbyu̶ñ .
44015018	Du'un je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios tyu̶y'ajt jékyu̶p yejky ma je̱'e̱ xu̶u̶ tiempo tu̶u̶bu̶ ñaxyu̶ñ , neby cham n'ijxu̶m nmu̶doowu̶mu̶ñ ajku̶xy . ’
44015019	“ Paady u̶u̶ch nmu̶na'añ ko ka'p mu̶baad nyajmu̶dzibu̶u̶yu̶m ajku̶xy pu̶nu̶ ka'p je̱'e̱ Moisés y'ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ padunaangu̶xy je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶chu̶ñ ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ jyekywyinma'añ tu̶ u̶xmajtzku̶xyu̶ñ y tu̶ mu̶bu̶jkku̶xy je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt .
44015020	Tzu̶gu̶tztu̶y nijayu̶u̶yu̶m ajku̶xy ko ka'p mu̶baad tzu'tzku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ ja'ay tzaadzéch kepychech yajwindzu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xypyu̶ñ , ka'p je̱'e̱ wiing to'oxyu̶jk mu̶baad mu̶dtuundu̶gooygyu̶xy , ka'p je̱'e̱ no'on ju̶yujk mu̶baad tzu'tzku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ yo'kwiidy o'kpu̶ñ , nan ni je̱'e̱ ju̶yujk ne'pty mu̶baad ka'ajú̶kxku̶xy .
44015021	Je̱' ko je'emy je̱'e̱ jii pu̶njaty je̱'e̱ Moisés y'ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ u̶u̶wa'kxp kapxwa'kxku̶xpu̶ñ kajpt kajpt majaty je̱'e̱ naymyujktaakt naag naag je̱'e̱ pokxyxyu̶u̶ju̶ñ .
44015022	Chi je̱'e̱ apóstolestu̶jk y mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk nigu'ubajk'ajtku̶xpu̶ñ , y mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk nigu̶xyu̶ kipxy wyinmaaygyu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ ja'ay nije̱' win'ixaangu̶xy ma je̱' ajku̶xyu̶ñ y ke̱xaangu̶xy jim Antioquía kipxy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Pablo y mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé . Chi je̱'e̱ Judas win'ijxy ajku̶xy , mu̶dyiibu̶ najty nandu'un yajtijpu̶ñ Barsabás y mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas ; ya'aydyu̶jktu̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ ku'umaay ijtku̶xpu̶ñ ma je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk ajku̶xyu̶ñ ,
44015023	y je̱' je̱'e̱ naky yajmu̶gue̱jxku̶x mu̶dyiibu̶ najty tu̶ jaaygyu̶xyu̶ñ : “ U̶u̶ch apóstolestu̶jk ajku̶xy y mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk nigu'ubajk'ajtku̶xpu̶ñ , miich je̱'e̱ mmu̶gu'ugtu̶jk ajku̶xy , cham u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ yajpókxu̶ñ ngue̱jxku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk ajku̶xy ka'pu̶ jyudíoja'ayu̶ch mu̶dyiibu̶ jim Antioquía , jim Siria y jim Cilicia tzu̶naaygyu̶xpu̶ñ .
44015024	Tu̶ u̶u̶ch nnejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ ja'ay nije̱' tu̶ xyñi'ooygyu̶xy , chóngu̶xy yaa ma u̶u̶ch ajku̶xyu̶ñ , ka'p je̱'e̱ u̶u̶ch ngue̱jxku̶x ko xymyu̶'amayu̶u̶ygyu̶xu̶ch mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ y'ayuuk , y tu̶ xyajwinma'añdyu̶gooygyu̶xy .
44015025	Paady u̶u̶ch nigu̶xyu̶ tu̶ nnaygyápxu̶gu̶xy ko u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ ja'ay nije̱' nwin'ixaangu̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ yajpaatku̶xpu̶ñ ma u̶u̶ch ajku̶xyu̶ñ , ko wan nu̶kxy xy'ijxku̶xy niguipxyu̶ mu̶u̶d u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ nmu̶gu'ugtu̶jk ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ u̶u̶ch oy ndzojkypy nju̶wu̶u̶ygyu̶xypyu̶ñ je̱'e̱ Bernabé y mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Pablo .
44015026	Je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ jyugy'ajt tu̶ yojxku̶xyu̶ñ mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ nWindzú̶n Jesucristo kyu̶xpu̶ ajtu̶m ajku̶xy .
44015027	Y cham u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ Judas mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas ngue̱jxku̶xy , y je̱' ku̶'u̶m xyajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xu̶p xy'awaandaayu̶ch adayaaba ayuuk ku̶xyu̶ ajku̶xy .
44015028	Tu̶ je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo du'un myu̶na'añ y u̶u̶ch nandu'un ajku̶xy ko ka'p je̱'e̱ tzaachpyu̶ ayuuk mu̶baad nyajni'ibu̶jkku̶xy , je̱'e̱du̶'ajty je'eyu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ tzipku̶xpu̶ñ :
44015029	ko ka'p mdzu'tzku̶xu̶ch mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ ja'ay tzaadzéch kepychech yajwindzu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xypyu̶ñ , ko ka'p je̱'e̱ ne'pty mjú̶kxku̶xu̶ch ni je̱'e̱ no'on ju̶yujk mga'atzu'tzku̶xu̶ch mu̶dyiibu̶ yo'kwiidy o'kpu̶ñ , y nan ka'p je̱'e̱ wiing to'oxyu̶jk mmu̶dtuundu̶gooygyu̶xu̶ch . Pu̶nu̶ mguydyuundaaby adaa ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ du'un ajku̶xy , oy naty du'un mduungu̶xy , y Dios xypyubé̱du̶p xypyudu̶gu̶'u̶wu̶p ajku̶xy . ”
44015030	Y Ko yajke̱jxku̶xy , chi jim Antioquía ñú̶kxku̶xy , y jim je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk woomujkku̶xy y yajku̶'u̶du̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy je̱'e̱ naky .
44015031	Ko je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk naky kapxy ajku̶xy , chi oy jyootkugu̶ydyaaygyu̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ oybyu̶ ayuuk tu̶u̶bu̶ najty yajnigue̱jxu̶gu̶xyu̶ .
44015032	Je̱'e̱ Judas mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas Dios najty y'ayuuknajtzkapxu̶u̶ybyu̶du̶jk je̱'e̱ ajku̶xy , paady je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk yajjootkugu̶u̶y y joot'amu̶jmooygyu̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ y'ayuuk ajku̶xy .
44015033	Jeky jim wya'kxu̶jpku̶xy , y chi je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk jyakmu̶gápxu̶gu̶xy ; yajku̶'u̶wanu̶u̶yu̶gu̶xnu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios ko najty jim Jerusalén wyimbidaangu̶xnu̶ ma najty tu̶ y'oktzóngu̶xpu̶ju̶ñ .
44015034	[ Peru̶ chi je̱'e̱ Silas wyinmaay ko najty wyu̶'u̶ma'añ ]
44015035	Peru̶ je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Bernabé wu̶'u̶mgu̶x je̱'e̱ jim Antioquía , y niguipxy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ wiingpu̶ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk nimay yaj'u̶xpu̶jk'adu̶u̶tzku̶xy y kapxwa'kx'adu̶u̶tzku̶xy je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt .
44015036	Tu̶ najty we̱e̱nu̶ y'ijtnu̶ , ko je̱'e̱ Pablo nu̶maay je̱'e̱ Bernabé : — Jam je̱'e̱ nmu̶gu'ugtu̶jk ja'adu'ook okku'ijxu̶m kajpt kajpt majaty je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt tu̶ ngapxwa'kxu̶mu̶ñ , wan nnejwu̶u̶yu̶mu̶ch neby yajpaatku̶xyu̶ñ .
44015037	Je̱'e̱ Bernabé myu̶dnu̶kxe̱e̱mby najty je̱'e̱ Juan mu̶dyiibu̶ nandu'un tyijpyu̶ñ ajku̶xy Marcos ;
44015038	peru̶ ka'p je̱'e̱ Pablo ku'ubu̶jky ko je̱'e̱ Marcos mu̶dnú̶kxku̶xu̶ch , je̱' ko tu̶ najty jim Panfilia y'okku'ugue̱e̱ku̶gu̶xpu̶ y ka'p najty je̱'e̱ tuung tu̶ myu̶d'yajtu'uyo'oy'adu̶u̶tzu̶gu̶xy .
44015039	Ka'p ñay'ayuukwinju̶wu̶u̶yu̶gu̶xy , y timyñaybyuyo'oydyuuttu̶ ajku̶xy . Chi je̱'e̱ Bernabé je̱'e̱ Marcos mu̶dnu̶kxy y chi byarcu̶tu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy y ñú̶kxku̶xy jim Chipre ,
44015040	y Pablo je̱'e̱ Silas win'ijx , chi je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios yajku̶'u̶waanu̶u̶yu̶gu̶xy , y chi jim chóngu̶xy ,
44015041	y ñajxku̶xy jim Siria y jim Cilicia joot'amu̶jmooygyu̶xy je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk majaty je̱'e̱ kajptu̶ñ .
44016001	Chi je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas oy jya'tku̶xy jim Derbe y chi jim chondu̶gajtzku̶xnu̶ba y oy Listra jya'tku̶xy . Jim je̱'e̱ ja'ay tu'ug mu̶dnaybyaattu̶ ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Timoteo mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Jesús najty mu̶bu̶jkpu̶ñ , judío ja'ay najty je̱'e̱ tyaj'ajtypy y nan myu̶bu̶jkypy je̱'e̱ Jesús , y griego ja'ay tyeedy'ajtypy .
44016002	Je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim Listra y jim Iconio tzu̶naaygyu̶xpu̶ñ oy yajxón najty je̱'e̱ Timoteo nigapx nimu̶dyaakku̶xy .
44016003	Pablo jya'atzojkypy najty je̱' ko je̱'e̱ Timoteo jyaymyu̶dadu̶u̶ju̶ch , peru̶ chi jayu̶jp tu̶y'ajtu̶u̶y ka'pu̶ je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay myu̶jootma'ttu̶gu̶xu̶ch mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim tzu̶naaygyu̶xpu̶ñ , je̱' ko nigu̶xyu̶ najty nejwu̶ydyaaygyu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Timoteo griego ja'ay najty teedy'áty .
44016004	Kajpt kajpt majaty najty ñajxku̶xyu̶ñ , yajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xypy najty je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk je̱'e̱ ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ apóstolestu̶jk y mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk jim Jerusalén nigu'ubajk'ajtku̶xpu̶ñ najty tu̶ ye̱jkku̶xyu̶ñ .
44016005	Y je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk ni'igyu̶ najty je̱'e̱ jyootmu̶kpu̶jkku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ myu̶bu̶jku̶ñ ajku̶xyu̶ñ , y ñimayu̶y'adu̶u̶tzku̶xy jaboom jaboom .
44016006	Ka'p je̱'e̱ Espíritu Santo ku'ubu̶jky nu̶kxy je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt jim Asia naaxjooty kapxwa'kxku̶xy , paady je̱'e̱ Frigia naaxjooty y Galacia naaxjooty yaj'yo'oyñajxy ajku̶xy ,
44016007	y oy jim jya'tku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ Misia ñaaxtzu̶ba'anu̶ñ . Jim wyinmaaygyu̶xy ko najty jim Bitinia naaxjooty ñu̶kxaangu̶xy , peru̶ ka'p je̱'e̱ Jesús y'Espíritu ku'ubu̶jky ko jim ñú̶kxku̶xu̶ch .
44016008	Chi Misia naaxjooty tu̶yu̶ ñajxku̶xy y kyu'unajxku̶xy jim ma je̱'e̱ barco ni'igu̶daaktaakt mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Troas .
44016009	Jim je̱'e̱ Pablo Dios tzum kuma'ayjyooty yaj'ijxu̶ ; ijxy je̱'e̱ ja'ay tu'ug kyunaaxu̶ch Macedonia naaxjooty , tyu̶na'ay ma je̱' wyinduuyu̶ñ , myu̶waanda'agyii myu̶nukxta'agyii , ñu̶ma'ayii : “ Tun may'ajt nu̶kx jim Macedonia y jim u̶u̶ch xypyubé̱du̶ch ajku̶xy . ”
44016010	Ko je̱'e̱ Pablo Dios du'un yaj'ijxu̶ , chi u̶u̶ch nayñi'ixu̶ydyu̶gu̶u̶yu̶ ajku̶xy , nnu̶kxaangu̶xyu̶ch jim Macedonia , nwinju̶wu̶u̶yu̶ch du'un ajku̶xy ko u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ Dios jim xykye̱jxku̶xy neby u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ oybyu̶ ayuuk tu̶y'ajt jim mu̶baad ngapxwa'kxku̶xyu̶ñ .
44016011	Chi u̶u̶ch jim Troas nbarcu̶tu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy nú̶kxyu̶ch tu̶yu̶ ajku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ naax mejy'agujkpu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Samotracia , kujaboom u̶u̶ch jim Neápolis nja'tku̶xy .
44016012	Ko u̶u̶ch jim ndzóngu̶xy , chi u̶u̶ch jim Filipos nu̶kxy ajku̶xy , je̱'e̱ romano ja'ay kyajpt ajku̶xy y je̱' je̱'e̱ jakmu̶jpu̶ kajpt ma je̱'e̱ Macedonia ñaaxpa'aju̶ñ . Jim u̶u̶ch jeky nwa'kxu̶jpy ajku̶xy .
44016013	Pokxyxyu̶u̶ u̶u̶ch kajppa'a nu̶kxy ajku̶xy , mu̶wingón tu'ug mu̶jnu̶u̶ ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay je̱'e̱ Dios o'owu̶dajtaakt najty mu̶dajtku̶chu̶ñ . Chi u̶u̶ch jim nnaxwé̱tzku̶xy y ngapxwa'kxku̶xyu̶ch je̱'e̱ Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt ma je̱'e̱ to'oxyu̶jktu̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim tu̶ yo'oymyujkku̶xyu̶ñ .
44016014	Nidu'ugtu̶ je̱'e̱ to'oxyu̶jktu̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ najty xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Lidia , jim Tiatira je̱'e̱ najty kyugajptu̶ch y óyjyatypyu̶ uky wit najty je̱'e̱ tyoogy'ajtypy . Je̱'e̱ Lidia yajmu̶j'ajtypy najty Dios je̱' y amdo'ijtp najty je̱'e̱ jim , y je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios je̱'e̱ jyoot wyinma'añ yaj'yuungu̶u̶yu̶xu̶ neby mu̶baad oy amdo'ítyu̶ñ neby je̱'e̱ Pablo je̱'e̱ Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt kapxwa'kxu̶ju̶ñ .
44016015	Chi je̱'e̱ Lidia ñu̶u̶bejty kipxy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ jyuugytyu̶jk myu̶gu'ugtu̶jk nigu̶xyu̶ ajku̶xy , y chi u̶u̶ch xymyu̶waandaaky xymyu̶nukxtaaky ajku̶xy , xyñu̶maaygyu̶xyu̶ch : — Pu̶nu̶ mu̶naamb du'un ajku̶xy ko u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios nmu̶bu̶ky , minxu̶ ja'ttaakku̶x ma u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ ndu̶jku̶ñ . Y adzip u̶u̶ch jim xyajwu̶'u̶my ajku̶xy .
44016016	Du'un tu'ook jyajty , ko u̶u̶ch najty nnú̶kxku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ Dios o'owu̶dajtaaktu̶ñ , chi u̶u̶ch oy nbaatku̶xy tu'ug je̱'e̱ to'oxy'ana'k tuumbu̶ ni'idoogypyu̶ . Mu̶jku'u winma'añ najty je̱'e̱ myu̶u̶d mu̶dyiibu̶ mu̶u̶d ñi''ixy xyu̶u̶máyu̶ñ , y myu̶u̶d najty wyindzu̶ndu̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ mu̶u̶d tyuñu̶ñ , y je̱'e̱ wyindzu̶ndu̶jk oy najty je̱'e̱ jyanchkumeeñgyojku̶xnu̶ ko je̱'e̱ to'oxy'ana'k ñi''ixy xyu̶u̶máy .
44016017	Je̱'e̱ to'oxy'ana'k je̱'e̱ Pablo je̱'e̱ najty jyanchpawu̶dijtypy y u̶u̶ch ajku̶xy cham janch mu̶kjaty myu̶na'añ : — ¡ Adaa ja'ay ajku̶xy je̱'e̱ mu̶jmu̶k'ajtmu̶u̶dpu̶ Dios mu̶duumbu̶ yu̶'u̶ ajku̶xy , y Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt yu̶'u̶ kyapxwa'kxu̶py ajku̶xy du'un neby je̱'e̱ m'aanu̶mu̶ ni'idzooku̶ñ mu̶baad mbaatku̶xyu̶ñ !
44016018	Ka'anaag xu̶u̶ u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ du'un xyjyanchnu̶ne̱'e̱mu̶u̶ygyu̶xy , ko je̱'e̱ Pablo chijpu̶nu̶ , chi wya'agwimbijty nu̶maay je̱'e̱ mu̶jku'u mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ to'oxy'ana'k najty mu̶dajtu̶bu̶ñ : — Mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Jesucristo xyu̶u̶ yam n'ane'emy ko pu̶dzu̶m ma adaa to'oxy'ana'ku̶ñ . Timymyu̶'ityu̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶jku'u je̱'e̱ to'oxy'ana'k yaj'yo'oydyuuty .
44016019	Peru̶ ko je̱'e̱ to'oxy'ana'k wyindzu̶ndu̶jk du'un ijxku̶xy ko du'un ka'p y'okmeeñbyadaangu̶xnu̶ mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ to'oxy'ana'k kyu̶xpu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ ni''ijxp xu̶u̶maaybyu̶ñ , chi je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas majtzku̶xy y yajnú̶kxku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ tuungmu̶u̶dpu̶du̶jk ma je̱'e̱ ja'ay jyuuygyu̶xy tyókku̶xyu̶ñ .
44016020	Chi jiiby mu̶dja'tku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ kudungtu̶jk ajku̶xyu̶ñ , cham myu̶naangu̶xy : — Adaa ja'ay judío ja'ay adaa ajku̶xy , nigoo nnaax ngajpt yu̶'u̶ xyajma'ttu̶yu̶ ajtu̶m ajku̶xy ,
44016021	y yaj'u̶xpu̶jkku̶xy je̱'e̱ kostumbre mu̶dyiibu̶ u̶u̶ch ka'p mu̶baad ngu'ubu̶jku̶m ajku̶xy y ni mu̶baad nga'akuydyuunu̶m ajku̶xy , je̱' ko nromanoja'ayu̶ch ajtu̶m ajku̶xy .
44016022	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ mayjya'ay je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas nibu̶du̶'kku̶xy , y chi je̱'e̱ jueez ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ ye̱jkku̶xy ko wan yajni'ije̱e̱n yaj'u̶xje̱e̱ngu̶xy y wan yajwojpku̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ paxy .
44016023	Ko wojptaaygyu̶xy janch mu̶k , chi pujxtu̶gooty pu̶daakku̶xy y ane̱'e̱mgu̶xy je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jk windzú̶n ko wan oy yajxón kweentu̶'ajtku̶xy .
44016024	Ko je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jk windzú̶n ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ pyaattu̶ , chi jiiby jak'o'og'aamdu̶góy pujxtu̶gooty pu̶daakku̶xy y chi je̱'e̱ tyeky pu̶daaku̶ ajku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ kepy yajtze̱jtztu'udy mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ cepo .
44016025	Chi du'un jyajty mu̶jkuwa'kxychuum najty , ko je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas Dios najty mu̶bu̶jktzoogu̶xy y win'u̶u̶gu̶xy winyaaxku̶xy , cham je̱'e̱ wiingpu̶ pujxtu̶jkja'ay je'eyu̶ y'amdo'ijtku̶xy .
44016026	Chi je̱'e̱ temblor amoñygyu̶joot myiiñ janch mu̶k , winxijty je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jk poch'u̶jx . Chi je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jk agu̶'u̶ mu̶k'eemby ku̶xyu̶ y'awaatztaay , y y'aje̱e̱nduuttaay je̱'e̱ cadeenu̶ ku̶xyu̶ ma je̱'e̱ maybyujxtu̶jkja'ay kyu̶'u̶ tyeky najty ajku̶xyu̶ñ .
44016027	Ko je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jk windzú̶n oy mya'aybyu̶du̶'u̶gy y ko du'un ijxy ko agu̶ awa'adz je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jk agu̶'u̶ , chi je̱'e̱ pyujxk espaadu̶ juty , ñayyaj'o'oga'añyii najty , je̱' ko du'un najty je̱'e̱ myu̶na'añ tu̶ ndijy je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jkja'ay najty ku̶xyu̶ kye̱e̱ktaaygyu̶xy .
44016028	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶k'eemby mu̶k mu̶gapxy je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jk windzú̶n , y nu̶maay : — ¡ Ka'p nej mnaydyuuñyii , cheeby u̶u̶ch nigu̶xyu̶ ajku̶xy !
44016029	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jk windzú̶n ju̶u̶n yujkwaañ , y tyu̶gu̶u̶y poyu̶'u̶gyu̶ pujxtu̶gooty , y janch tzu̶yuuby mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ tzu̶gu̶'u̶ñ , chi ñayñajtzkojxtu̶na'awu̶u̶yu̶ ma je̱'e̱ Pablo y je̱'e̱ Silas wyinduuy ajku̶xyu̶ñ .
44016030	Chi yajpu̶dzu̶u̶mgu̶xy y yajtu̶u̶y ajku̶xy : — Windzu̶ndu̶jk , ¿ ti u̶u̶ch mu̶baad nduñ neby u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ nni'idzooku̶ñ nbaadu̶chu̶ñ ?
44016031	Chi je̱' y'adzooy ajku̶xy : — Mu̶bu̶k je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Jesús , y du'un je̱'e̱ aanu̶mu̶ ni'idzooku̶ñ mbaadu̶ch miich y mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ m'ung mdo'oxyu̶jk .
44016032	Chi je̱'e̱ Windzú̶n Dios y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt yajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xy , je̱' , y ku̶xyu̶ pu̶njaty najty jim ma je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jk windzú̶n tyu̶jku̶ñ .
44016033	Mu̶jkuwa'kxychuum najtyñu̶ ko je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jk windzú̶n je̱'e̱ Pablo y je̱'e̱ Silas chu̶chu̶'u̶'aa puju̶ ajku̶xy , chi nigu̶xyu̶ ñu̶u̶be̱jtku̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ y'ung tyo'oxyu̶jk .
44016034	Chi je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas mu̶dnú̶kxku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ tyu̶jku̶ñ y yajkaay yaj'uuky ajku̶xy , janch jootkujk najty nigu̶xyu̶ ajku̶xyu̶ñ ko je̱'e̱ Dios najty tu̶ mu̶bu̶jktaaygyu̶xy .
44016035	Ko jyobu̶u̶y , mu̶'it je̱'e̱ kuduung policiatu̶jk ke̱jxku̶xy jim ma je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jk windzu̶nu̶ñ mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ ko je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas wan najtzmadzu̶u̶ygyu̶xy .
44016036	Chi je̱'e̱ pujxtu̶jk windzú̶n Pablo nu̶maay : — Tu̶ je̱'e̱ kuduungdu̶jk ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ ke̱jxku̶xy ko miich mu̶baad nnajtzmadzu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ; y mu̶baad jootkujk mnú̶kxku̶xnu̶ .
44016037	Chi je̱'e̱ Pablo je̱'e̱ policiatu̶jk mu̶gapxy , nu̶maay ajku̶xy : — Romano ja'ay u̶u̶ch ajku̶xy , je̱'e̱ kajpttuungmu̶u̶dpu̶ u̶u̶ch mayjya'ayjyooty tu̶ xywyojpku̶xy y ka'p u̶u̶ch jayu̶jp tu̶ xy'oktu̶ydyuungu̶xy , y tu̶ xypyu̶daakku̶xyu̶ch pujxtu̶gooty ; ¿ y chámu̶tz amechu̶ xyñajtzmadzu̶'u̶waangu̶xyu̶ch ? ¡ Ka'p du'un y'óyu̶ch ! Wan je̱'e̱ ku̶'u̶m miingu̶xy míñu̶ch xyajpu̶dzu̶u̶mgu̶xy .
44016038	Chi je̱'e̱ policiatu̶jk oy ku̶jx myu̶dyaaktaaygyu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ kuduungdu̶jk ajku̶xyu̶ñ ku̶xyu̶ je̱'e̱ Pablo y'ayuuk . Chi je̱'e̱ kuduungdu̶jk mu̶k chu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ko oy du'un nejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas najty ryomanoja'ayu̶ch ajku̶xy .
44016039	Chi je̱'e̱ kuduungdu̶jk ku̶'u̶m ñu̶kxy ajku̶xy oy kyapxnukxtaakku̶xy jiiby pujxtu̶gooty ma je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas najty yajpaatku̶xyu̶ñ . Chi pujxtu̶gooty yajpu̶dzu̶u̶mgu̶xy y mu̶ju̶u̶ydyaaky mu̶nukxtaaky ajku̶xy ko wan kajptjooty pu̶dzu̶u̶mgu̶xy .
44016040	Ko je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas pyujxtu̶jkpu̶dzu̶u̶my ajku̶xy , chi ñú̶kxku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ Lidia tyu̶jku̶ñ , y ko je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk oy ku'ijx mu̶gápxku̶xy y joot'amu̶jmooygyu̶xy , chi jim chóngu̶xnu̶ .
44017001	Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas najxku̶x ma je̱'e̱ kajpt Anfípolis y Apolonia , chi oy Tesalónica jya'tku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ñaymyujktaakt najty tu'ug mu̶u̶du̶chu̶ñ ajku̶xy .
44017002	Je̱' ko du'un najty je̱'e̱ Pablo kostumbre mu̶u̶du̶ch ñu̶kxy ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ñaymyujktaakt ajku̶xyu̶ñ pokxyxyu̶u̶ , y tu̶gu̶u̶g pokxyxyu̶u̶ jim Tesalónica kyapxy myu̶dyaaky mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ajku̶xy . Yajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xy neby kyuja'ayu̶ch ma je̱'e̱ Dios ñakyu̶ñ ,
44017003	ko je̱'e̱ Cristo ayo'on tzipku̶xp yajnajxta'awu̶ch , y chi y'o'ogu̶ch , y mu̶'it ja'adu'ook jyuugypyú̶gu̶ch . Chi ñu̶maayu̶ ajku̶xy : — Je̱'e̱ Jesús mu̶dyiibu̶ u̶u̶ch je̱'e̱ y'ayuuk ngapxwa'kxu̶byu̶ñ ma miich ajku̶xyu̶ñ , je̱' je̱'e̱ Cristo .
44017004	Nije̱' je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay mu̶bu̶jky ajku̶xy y puyo'oyu̶u̶ygyu̶xy je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas . Nan may je̱'e̱ griego ja'ay mu̶bu̶jkku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios najty yajmu̶j'ajtku̶xpu̶ñ , y nan maydyo'oxyu̶jktu̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ najty oymyu̶jpu̶daaknu̶ju̶ñ , pyuyo'oyu̶u̶ygyu̶x je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas y myu̶bu̶jku̶ je̱'e̱ y'ayuuk ajku̶xy .
44017005	Paady je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay oy jyootma'ttaaygyu̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ najty ka'p mu̶bu̶jkku̶xyu̶ñ , mu̶'it je̱'e̱ ju̶bu̶kja'ay oy woomujkku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ najty nigoo kajptjooty wu̶dijtku̶xpu̶ñ , chi yaaxtu̶gu̶u̶y jyojktu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy y kyajpt yajma'tku̶xy , ane̱jp akojxtuuttu̶ je̱'e̱ Jasón tyu̶jk ajku̶xy , u̶xtaaygyu̶xy je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas y yajnu̶kxaangu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ kajpttuungmu̶u̶dpu̶ju̶ñ .
44017006	Y ko ka'apaatku̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ Jasón majtzku̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk nije̱' , yajnú̶kxku̶xy adzip pawich papo'oty ma je̱'e̱ kajpttuungmu̶u̶dpu̶ju̶ñ cham mu̶kjaty jyanchmu̶naangu̶xy : — ¡ Adaa ja'ay je̱' adaa ajku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ naax kajpt ku̶xyu̶ yajma'tku̶xpu̶ñ , nan yabaad nandu'un tu̶ myiingu̶xy ,
44017007	adaa Jasón je̱'e̱ tu̶ yajja'ttaakku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ tyu̶jku̶ñ ! ¡ Y nigu̶xyu̶ je̱'e̱ mu̶j'ane̱'e̱mbu̶ y'ane̱'e̱mu̶ñ mu̶dzip'ajtu̶ ajku̶xy , myu̶naangu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ mu̶j'ane̱'e̱mbu̶ jii ja'adu'ug , y je̱' je̱' je̱'e̱ Jesús !
44017008	Ko adaa du'un mu̶dooy ajku̶xy , chi je̱'e̱ kajptja'ay y je̱'e̱ kajpttuungmu̶u̶dpu̶du̶jk yaj'yumbe̱jt yaj'oxpe̱jtku̶xy je̱'e̱ Jasón mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk ajku̶xy .
44017009	Peru̶ je̱'e̱ Jasón mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk nayjyuuybyu̶dzu̶u̶mu̶gu̶x je̱' , y mu̶'it ñajtzmadzu̶u̶yu̶gu̶xy .
44017010	Ko oy kyoodzu̶u̶yñu̶ , mu̶k'eemby je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas kajptjooty yajpu̶dzu̶u̶mgu̶xy y ke̱jxku̶xy jim Berea . Y ko jim jya'tku̶xy , chi ñú̶kxku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ñaymyujktaaktu̶ñ .
44017011	Je̱'e̱ jim Bereaju̶ba judío ja'ay ajku̶xy ni'igu̶ jyakmu̶u̶d najty oyjyoot oywyinma'añ je̱'e̱ ajku̶xy , ni'igu̶ ka'p je̱'e̱ Tesalónica judío ja'ay ajku̶xy , y oy yajxón je̱'e̱ Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt ku'ubu̶jkku̶xy , y jaboom jaboom najty je̱'e̱ Dios ñaky u̶xpu̶jku̶ ajku̶xy pu̶nu̶ jaanch du'un myu̶na'añ neby je̱'e̱ Pablo yaj'u̶xpú̶kyu̶ñ .
44017012	May je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay mu̶bu̶jkku̶xy , y nan may je̱'e̱ griego ja'ay nandu'un mu̶bu̶jkku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ oymyu̶jpu̶daaknu̶ju̶ñ , to'oxyu̶jktu̶jk y ya'aydyu̶jktu̶jk ajku̶xy .
44017013	Peru̶ ko je̱'e̱ Tesalónica judío ja'ay oy nejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Pablo Dios ayuuk najty jim Berea nandu'un kapxwa'kxy , chi jim panú̶kxku̶xy y yaaxtu̶gu̶u̶y jyojktu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy ma je̱'e̱ kajptja'ay ajku̶xyu̶ñ .
44017014	Peru̶ chi je̱'e̱ mu̶bu̶jkpu̶du̶jk Pablo mu̶k'eemby mejypya'a ke̱jxku̶xy ko wan jim nu̶kxy . Chi je̱'e̱ Timoteo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas jim Berea jyakwu̶'u̶mgu̶xy .
44017015	Je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Pablo jaymyu̶dajtku̶xu̶ñ u̶xtu̶ jim Atenas je̱'e̱ y'ooygyu̶xy mu̶u̶d je̱' . Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ ayuuk mu̶wimbijtku̶xy ko je̱'e̱ Timoteo mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Silas wan nu̶kxy jim Atenas mu̶k'eemby paattu̶gu̶xyu̶ .
44017016	Ko je̱'e̱ Pablo je̱'e̱ Silas mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Timoteo jim Atenas najty ja'ay'éxy , mu̶k najty tyajy myay ko ijxy nejwu̶u̶y ko je̱'e̱ kajpt mu̶u̶du̶ch je̱'e̱ maykyepychech maychaadzéch y ooru̶ oydyúñ mu̶dyiibu̶ dios'ajtypyu̶ñ ajku̶xy .
44017017	Paady je̱'e̱ Jesús ja'animu̶dyaaky ma je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay ñaymyujktaakt ajku̶xyu̶ñ mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ judío ja'ay y mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ ja'ay jadyiiyu̶ mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ Dios mu̶yaaxp o'owu̶dajtku̶xpu̶ñ , y jaboom jaboom najty mu̶dkapx mu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xy pu̶njaty jim yo'oymyujkku̶xpu̶ñ ma je̱'e̱ ja'ay jyuuygyu̶xy tyókku̶xyu̶ñ .
44017018	Chi nandu'un y'amayu̶ydyu̶gu̶u̶ygyu̶xy nije̱' mu̶u̶d je̱'e̱ Pablo je̱'e̱ u̶xpu̶kyjya'aydyu̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ epicúrio u̶xpu̶jku̶ñ y estoico u̶xpu̶jku̶ñ mu̶dajtku̶xpu̶ñ . Nije̱' myu̶naangu̶xy : — ¿ Ti da'a du'un jya'akápxypy jya'amu̶dyaakypy adaa ja'ay , nigoo yu̶'u̶ jyanch'amayu̶'u̶y ? Y je̱'e̱ wiingpu̶ mu̶naangu̶xpu̶py : — Je̱' da'a jya'akapxwa'kxypy je̱'e̱ wiingpu̶ dios ayuuk . Paady najty du'un myu̶naangu̶xy je̱' ko je̱'e̱ Pablo je̱'e̱ oybyu̶ Jesús y'ayuuk tyu̶y'ajt najty kapxwa'kxy y du'un neby jyuugypyu̶jkyu̶ñ ko y'o'ky .
44017019	Chi je̱'e̱ Pablo mu̶dnú̶kxku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ u̶xpu̶kytyu̶jk najty ñaymyujku̶gu̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ xu̶u̶'ajtpu̶ñ Areópago , y yajtu̶u̶gu̶xy : — ¿ Mu̶baad u̶u̶ch nnejwu̶u̶ygyu̶xy adaa jembyu̶ u̶xpu̶jku̶ñ mu̶dyiibu̶ tu̶ mmu̶miñu̶ñ ?
44017020	Je̱' ko je̱'e̱ u̶u̶ch miich xyajmu̶dmu̶dyaakku̶xp je̱'e̱ ka'pu̶ u̶u̶ch nwinju̶wu̶u̶ygyu̶xy , y je̱' u̶u̶ch nja'anejwu̶'u̶waangu̶xypy neby je̱'e̱ du'un ku̶xyu̶ wyimbu̶dzu̶myu̶ñ .
44017021	Ku̶xyu̶ je̱'e̱ Atenas ja'ay ajku̶xy y nandu'un je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ najty jim adzu̶naaygyu̶xpu̶ñ , je̱' najty je̱'e̱ je'eyu̶ y'aa'ajtypy jyoot'ajtku̶xypy amdo'idaangu̶xy y nimu̶dya'agaangu̶xy je̱'e̱ jembyu̶ ayuuk y jembyu̶ u̶xpu̶jku̶ñ .
44017022	Mu̶'it je̱'e̱ Pablo tyu̶naayu̶'ky mayjya'ay'agujk jim Areópago , y myu̶naañ : — “ Atenas ja'ay ajku̶xy , n'ijxypyu̶ch ko miich ka'anaagnáx mjanch'o'owu̶dajtku̶xy mu̶dyiibu̶ mdios'ajtypyu̶ñ ajku̶xy .
44017023	Ko u̶u̶ch ya tu̶ nwu̶dity ma adayaaba kajptu̶ñ , ma je̱'e̱ mdios ka'anaagnáx m'o'owu̶dajtku̶xyu̶ñ , chi u̶u̶ch tu̶ nbaady tu'ug je̱'e̱ poch ma je̱'e̱ windzu̶gu̶'u̶ñ yaj'yékyu̶ñ ma du'un jya'ayu̶chu̶ñ : ‘ Je̱'e̱ Dios mu̶dyiibu̶ ka'p pu̶n ixy'atyu̶ñ . ’ Je̱'e̱ Dios mu̶dyiibu̶ miich m'o'owu̶dajtku̶xypyu̶ñ y ka'p m'ixy'ajtku̶xy , adaa je̱' je̱'e̱ mu̶dyiibu̶ nyajnu̶maaybyu̶ñ ajku̶xy .
44017024	“ Je̱'e̱ Dios mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ naaxwiimbu̶ yajkoju̶ñ y ku̶xyu̶ tijaty jii'ajtp , je̱' ku̶xyu̶ niwindzu̶n'ajttaaby je̱'e̱ tzajp y je̱'e̱ naax . Je̱'e̱ Dios ka'p je̱'e̱ chu̶na'ay ma je̱'e̱ tzajptu̶jk mu̶dyiibu̶ je̱'e̱ ja'ay kyojku̶xypyu̶ñ ,
44017025	y ka'p ni tii tyu̶goy'ajtku̶xyu̶ nu̶kxy je̱'e̱ naaxwiiñjya'ay pyubedyii , je̱' je̱'e̱ jugy'ajtu̶ñ nigu̶xyu̶ xymyooby ajtu̶m ajku̶xy y nan je̱' ye̱jkp mu̶dyiibu̶ nxe̱ju̶mby ajku̶xy y ku̶xyu̶ tijaty .
44017026	“ Y tu'kjoot tu'kne'pty je̱'e̱ ja'ay ku̶xyu̶ oydyuundaay neby mu̶baad chu̶naaygyu̶xy jyuugy'ajtku̶xy ma je̱'e̱ naaxwiimbu̶ kú̶xyu̶ju̶ñ , y tu̶ je̱'e̱ tu̶y'ajt yeky neby je̱'e̱ xu̶u̶ tiempo tyu'uyo'oyu̶chu̶ñ , y ma je̱'e̱ ja'ay mu̶baad chu̶naaygyu̶xy jyuugy'ajtku̶xyu̶ñ ,
44017027	neby je̱'e̱ Dios mu̶baad u̶xtaaygyu̶xyu̶ñ , oy it toonda'ay'eemby xajta'ay'eemby paadu̶ch ajku̶xy , je̱' ko ka'p it je̱'e̱ jya'aju̶gué̱mu̶ch ma u̶u̶ch nidu'ug nidu'ug ajtu̶m ajku̶xyu̶ñ .
